original: "A lawful use of deadly force is in progress. Citizens are advised to steer clear."
translation: “合法使用致命武力正在进行中。建议市民避开。”

original: "And we're back. This is Mr. New Vegas, and I feel something magic in the air tonight, and I'm not just talking about the gamma radiation."
translation: “我们回来了。我是新维加斯先生，今晚我感到空气中充满了魔力，我说的不仅仅是伽马射线。”

original: "Because one dog ain't enough, and Two is too low, its Three Dog! Bow wow, with the news."
translation: “因为一只狗不够，两只太低了，它的三只狗！“哇，有消息了。”

original: "Don't feed the Yao Guai. That is all."
"God bless the enclave. God bless America. God bless your heart."
translation: “上帝保佑这块飞地。上帝保佑美国。上帝保佑你的心。”

original: "Hello America. It's me again. John Henry Eden. I'd like to have a chat for a moment, if you don't mind."
translation: “你好，美国。又是我。约翰·亨利·伊登。如果你不介意的话，我想和你聊一会儿。”

original: "Hey everybody, this is Three Dog, your friendly neighborhood disc jockey. What's a disc? Hell if I know, but I'm gonna keep talking anyway."
translation: “嘿，各位，这是三只狗，你们友好的街坊唱片骑师。什么是光盘？如果我知道的话，那就见鬼了，不过我还是要继续说下去。”

original: "Hey nifty America, it's me, your President John Hen-- Hahaa, gotcha! Three Dog here, how's everyone doin'?"
translation: “嘿，漂亮的美国，是我，你们的总统约翰·亨利——哈哈，明白了！三只狗，大家好吗？”

original: "It's me again, Mr. New Vegas, reminding you that you're nobody 'til somebody loves you. And that somebody is me. I love you."
translation: “又是我，新维加斯先生，提醒你，除非有人爱你，否则你是无名小卒。那个人就是我。我爱你。”

original: "Looking for a Sidearm? Wattz has you covered."
translation: “要找武器吗？沃特兹已经把你掩护起来了。”

original: "People of America, this is your president, John Henry Eden. Stay calm, The Enclave is here to help."
translation: “美国人民，这是你们的总统，约翰·亨利·伊登。保持冷静，飞地是来帮忙的。”

original: "Present your subway token- *BZZZT* ERROR! DATA CORRUPTED."
translation: “出示地铁代币-*BZZT*错误！“数据已损坏。”

original: "Report any fire hazards to your local- *BZZZT* -Law enforcement."
translation: “向当地执法部门报告任何火灾危险。”

original: "Thank you for tuning into Radio Freedom. Nothing new to report. Stay tuned for updates."
translation: “谢谢你收听自由电台。没有什么新消息要报道。请继续关注最新消息。”

original: "Thank you so much for continued interest in Fallout: New England."
translation: “非常感谢大家继续关注《尘埃落定：新英格兰》。”

original: "The Enclave, and that includes their homecoming king, 'President' John Henry Eden and his gorilla, Colonel Augustus Autumn, are NOT here to help you."
translation: “飞地，包括他们返乡的国王，‘总统’约翰·亨利·伊登和他的大猩猩奥古斯都·秋上校，都不是来帮助你的。”

original: "The women of New Vegas ask me a lot if there's a Mrs. New Vegas. Well, of course there is. You're her. And you're still as perfect as the day we met."
translation: “新维加斯的女人问我有没有新维加斯太太。当然有。你就是她。你还是和我们见面那天一样完美。”

original: "This is Radio Freedom. General, we have a visitor at the castle. She wishes to see you."
translation: “这是无线电自由。将军，我们城堡有客人。她想见你。”

original: "This is radio freedom. Alls quiet. Stay safe out there."
translation: “这是无线电自由。一切都很安静。在外面保持安全。”

original: "This is radio new vegas, and I hope I'm not comin' on too strong."
translation: “这里是新维加斯电台，我希望我不会太过强势。”

original: "This workplace has gone ZERO days without an accident."
translation: “这个工作场所零天没有发生事故。”

original: "Wattz Consumer Electronics promises quality over all else."
translation: “瓦茨消费电子承诺质量高于一切。”

original: "Wattz lasers are garunteed to be at least twice as powerful as the rival brands."
translation: “Wattz激光的威力至少是竞争对手的两倍。”

original: "What rhymes with shoes, and gives you the blues? Thats right, its time for the CASHEWS... No wait, its time for the news."
translation: “什么和鞋子押韵，让你忧郁？没错，是时候吃腰果了。。。不，等等，是时候听新闻了。”

original: "You know, I tried to measure my Charisma on a Vit-o-matic Vigor Tester once. The machine burst into flames."
translation: “你知道吗，有一次我试着用Vit-o-matic活力测试仪来衡量自己的魅力。机器突然起火。”

original: "nine-four-five-four-two-zero-two-zero-one-zero. Accident in the gulf, several dead. Oil spill apparently averted."
translation: “九四五四二零二零一零。墨西哥湾发生事故，数人死亡。石油泄漏显然避免了。”

original: "one-eight-three-two-zero-one-two-zero-two-zero-one-nine. Have you watched my YouTube video yet? I uploaded myself kicking bums in the nuts."
translation: “一八三二零一二零二零一九。你看过我的YouTube视频了吗？我上传了我自己踢屁股在坚果。”

original: "one-seven-three-zero-one-zero-two-zero-two-zero-seven-seven. Washed the car today, maybe Chinese for dinner."
translation: “一七三零一零二零二零七七。今天洗车了，也许是中餐。”

original: "one-two-zero-five-five-two-eight-two-zero-one-zero. What are you talkin' about? You'll be missed."
translation: “一二零五五二八二零一零。你在说什么？我们会想念你的。”

original: "zero-four-zero-three-zero-seven-three-zero-one-nine-nine-nine. A great one has been born."
translation: “零四零三零七三零一九九。一个伟大的人诞生了。”

original: "zero-four-zero-two-zero-three-one-nine-two-zero-one-four.The Queen has died today. The world mourns, as on days like these, we are all Brits."
translation: “零四零二零三一九二零一-第四个。那个女王今天去世了。全世界都在哀悼，在这样的日子里，我们都是英国人。”

original: "zero-nine-four-seven-one-zero-two-three-two-zero-seven-seven. I can't believe they're actually done it. Not long left. The noise. I can't take the noise anymore. I have a pistol in the attic."
translation: “零九四七一零二三二零七七。我不敢相信他们真的做到了。没多久就走了。噪音。我再也受不了噪音了。我在阁楼上有一把手枪。”

original: %s prepares to fight with raised fists.

'Protect the people at a minute's notice.' That was the original idea. But now General Becker is a zombie, the Minutemen are a scattered memory, and all the people you were trying to protect are dead.
translation: “一分钟就保护人民。”这是最初的想法。但现在贝克尔将军是个僵尸，民兵只是一个零散的记忆，你试图保护的所有人都死了。

original: .357 Magnum ammunition. The bigger cousin of the .38 Special. Has more recoil, but does a hell of a lot more to targets.
translation: 357万能弹药。一个更大的表兄。有更多的后坐力，但对目标的影响更大。

original: .357 Magnum ammunition. The bigger cousin of the .38 Special. Has more recoil, but does a hell of a lot more to targets. Armor piercing. Perfect for the big iron on your hip.
translation: 357万能弹药。一个更大的表兄。有更多的后坐力，但对目标的影响更大。穿甲。非常适合你臀部的大熨斗。

original: .357 Magnum ammunition. The bigger cousin of the .38 Special. Has more recoil, but does a hell of a lot more to targets. In this case, a hollow point. Illegal in several countries and states due to how it works.
translation: 357万能弹药。一个更大的表兄。有更多的后坐力，但对目标的影响更大。在这种情况下，一个空心点。由于其工作原理，在一些国家和州是非法的。

original: .45-70 govt. ammunition. Popular in the old west, but rare nowadays.
translation: .45-70政府弹药。在旧西方很流行，但现在很少见。

original: 1$ NCR. Legal tender for the world of the wastes. Or. It would be, if you were in California, Nevada, Arizona, or Oregon, instead of the eternal plane of New England.
translation: 1美元NCR。废物世界的法定货币。或者。如果你在加利福尼亚州、内华达州、亚利桑那州或俄勒冈州，而不是新英格兰的永恒之地，那就是。

original: 4.7mm Caseless rounds. High-end ammunition, popular in heavier guns.
translation: 4.7毫米无壳子弹。高端弹药，在重型火炮中很流行。

original: A 100 round 5mm drum magazine. For when you really, REALLY want an enemy dead.
translation: 一个100毫米的圆鼓弹匣。当你真的，真的想要一个敌人死的时候。

original: A 105mm High Explosive Anti Tank round.  It could ruin anyone's whole life.
translation: 105毫米高爆反坦克子弹。它会毁了任何人的一生。

original: A 105mm cannon from an infantry fighting vehicle.  Obviously it needs to be mounted on a vehicle to fire.
translation: 步兵战车上的105毫米加农炮。显然它需要装在车上才能开火。

original: A 140mm High Explosive Anti Tank round.  More than enough firepower for whatever you could think to point it at.
translation: 140毫米高爆反坦克子弹。有足够的火力来对付任何你能想到的东西。

original: A 140mm shell with a new primer installed, filled with a huge amount of buckshot.  Effectively turns your tank guns into a spray of tiny balls of death.
translation: 一个装有新底漆的140毫米炮弹，装满了大量子弹。有效地把你的坦克炮变成了一团死亡的小球。

original: A 140mm shell with a new primer installed, filled with a massive handmade slug.  While non-explosive, its still beyond lethal to creatures, and would likely punch through walls.
translation: 一个装有新底漆的140毫米炮弹，里面装满了一个巨大的手工弹头。虽然不具有爆炸性，但它对生物的杀伤力仍然很强，很可能会穿透墙壁。

original: A 150-round drum magazine for the Thompson submachine gun.  Made only for use with the Silver Submachine gun, due to specialty parts.
translation: 为汤普森冲锋枪准备的150个圆鼓弹匣。仅用于银冲锋枪，由于特殊部件。

original: A 155mm High Explosive Fragmentation round.  Designed to give anything near what you hit a really bad day.
translation: 一枚155毫米高爆破片弹。设计的目的是让任何东西接近你遇到了一个非常糟糕的一天。

original: A 25mm beanbag that deals massive, but less-lethal, force.
translation: 一个25毫米的豆包，能产生巨大但不那么致命的力量。

original: A 25mm grenade designed to provide smoke cover.
translation: 一种25毫米的手榴弹，用来提供烟雾掩护。

original: A 25mm grenade with a buckshot load.
translation: 一个25毫米的手榴弹，上面有子弹。

original: A 25mm grenade with a concussive explosion load.
translation: 一枚25毫米的手榴弹，带有冲击爆炸载荷。

original: A 25mm grenade with a flashbang load.  It will detonate with a blast of light and sound, designed to blind, deafen, and disorient anyone nearby.
translation: 一枚25毫米的手榴弹，装有闪光弹。它将爆炸的光和声音，旨在失明，耳聋，并迷失方向附近的任何人。

original: A 25mm grenade with a small explosive load and a high number of damaging fragments.
translation: 一种25毫米的手榴弹，爆炸量小，有大量的破坏性碎片。

original: A 25mm grenade with a small napalm load, designed to create a burst of flame.
translation: 装有少量凝固汽油弹的25毫米手榴弹，设计用来制造火焰爆发。

original: A 25mm grenade with a teargas load.  It will burst in a cloud of highly incapacitating gas.
translation: 一枚装有催泪瓦斯的25毫米手榴弹。它会在一团高度失能的气体中爆炸。

original: A 25mm grenade with an armor-piercing flechette load.
translation: 一枚25毫米的手榴弹，装有穿甲弹。

original: A 25mm signal flare.  It will burn brightly for up to a minute, and will also leave a streak of smoke cover in its wake.
translation: 25毫米信号弹。它会明亮地燃烧长达一分钟，还会在尾迹中留下一道浓烟。

original: A 30 round 25mm drum magazine, for use in the grenade MG.
translation: 一个30圆25毫米的鼓式弹匣，用于手榴弹。

original: A 300 round 25mm drum magazine, for use in the grenade MG. This thing can annihalate a small town before loading
translation: 一个300圆形25毫米的鼓形弹匣，用于手榴弹。这东西可以在装货前把一个小镇弄干净

original: A 500 round 4.7mm box. For when you really, REALLY don't want to stop shooting. Load today and shoot 'til sunday!
translation: 一个500圆4.7毫米的盒子。当你真的，真的不想停止射击的时候。今天装弹直到周日！

original: A 500 round 5mm box. For when you really, REALLY don't want to stop shooting. Load today and shoot 'til sunday!
translation: 一个500毫米的圆盒子。当你真的，真的不想停止射击的时候。今天装弹直到周日！

original: A 5mm Armor Piercing round, typically used in miniguns and select rifles.
translation: 5毫米穿甲弹一种5毫米穿甲弹，通常用于小型火炮和精选步枪。

original: A 5mm Jacketed Hollow Point, typically used in miniguns and select rifles.
translation: 一种有5毫米套的空心尖头，通常用于小型火炮和精选步枪。

original: A 5mm round, typically used in miniguns and select rifles.
translation: 一种5毫米的子弹，通常用于小型手枪和精选步枪。

original: A 6 shot 25mm grenade launcher manufactured by the Gun Runners.
translation: 一种6发25毫米榴弹发射器，由运枪者制造。

original: A 70mm autocannon round using a high-explosive, dual-purpose shell. Commonly used against light to medium armored vehicles.
translation: 一个70毫米的自动炮弹，使用一个高爆的，两用的炮弹。常用于轻型到中型装甲车辆。

original: A 70mm autocannon round with its primer replaced, and loaded with a basic lead projectile.  Not nearly as effective as the real thing.
translation: 一个70毫米的自动炮弹，替换了它的底火，装了一个基本的铅弹。不如真的那么有效。

original: A 70mm autocannon round, high explosive incendiary.  Designed for use against unarmored vehicles and to suppress infantry.
translation: 一个70毫米的自动炮弹，高爆燃烧弹。设计用于对付无武装车辆和镇压步兵。

original: A 70mm bubble autocannon, typically mounted to either side of an Infantry Fighting Vehicle to give it its distinctive 'whiskers'
translation: 一种70毫米的气泡式自动驾驶炮，通常安装在步兵战车的两侧，使其具有独特的“胡须”

original: A AER14 Prototype Laser Rifle. Meant to replace the aging laser rifle models on the market, it is a great balance between the Wattz and AER9 laser weapons. However, as a prototype, it is more finnicky and prone to damage. It has a pretty green beam.
translation: AER14激光步枪的原型。意在取代市场上老化的激光步枪模型，这是一个伟大的平衡瓦茨和AER9激光武器。然而，作为一个原型，它更容易损坏。它有一个漂亮的绿色光束。

original: A AER9 Lase Rifle, modded to shoot like a shotgun. It drains three times the power, but does so much more damage.
translation: 一把9口径步枪，改装成散弹枪一样射击。它消耗的能量是原来的三倍，但造成的伤害要大得多。

original: A AER9 Lase Rifle. Not the top model in service, but it's high durability and reliability renders it far more popular than the finnicky AEP12, while the use of batteries over UPS makes it simpler for the laser user in a pinch.
translation: 一把9口径步枪。虽然不是目前使用的顶级机型，但它的高耐用性和可靠性使得它远比芬尼基AEP12更受欢迎，而在UPS上使用电池则使其在紧要关头对激光用户更为简单。

original: A Colt 6520 10mm autoloading pistol. Each pull of the trigger will automatically reload the firearm until the magazine is empty. Single shot only, using the powerful 10mm round.
translation: 柯尔特6520 10毫米自动手枪。每次扣动扳机都会自动重新装填枪械，直到弹药库清空。只有单发，使用10毫米的强力子弹。

original: A Colt 6520 10mm autoloading pistol. Each pull of the trigger will automatically reload the firearm until the magazine is empty. Single shot only, using the powerful 10mm round. This one was well loved, it seems.
translation: 柯尔特6520 10毫米自动手枪。每次扣动扳机都会自动重新装填枪械，直到弹药库清空。只有单发，使用10毫米的强力子弹。这一个似乎很受欢迎。

original: A Colt Rangemaster semi-automatic rifle, in .223 caliber. Single-shot only. It's popular for hunting vermin.
translation: 小马骑兵半自动步枪，口径223。只有一个镜头。它很流行用来猎杀害虫。

original: A Mauser M/96 in 9x19mm Parabellum. In excellent condition. Extremely accurate, if a relic of the Old World.
translation: 9×19毫米抛物面中的Mauser M/96。状况良好。非常准确，如果是旧世界的遗迹。

original: A Radiation King brand radio with a self-contained atomic power source. It connects to a few radio stations, mostly oldies stations.
translation: 一种辐射王牌收音机，配有独立的原子动力源。它连接到几个广播电台，大部分是老式电台。

original: A Radiation King brand radio, with a self-contained atomic battery, causing it to not drain power off the vehicle. The only stations on play oldies. odd.
translation: 一个辐射王品牌的收音机，带有一个独立的原子电池，使它不会耗尽车辆的电力。唯一播放老歌的电台。奇怪。

original: A Radiation King brand television with a self-contained atomic power source. Some survivors seem to have taken some old television stations over, and some robots are maintaining animation channels. It has a built in picture-in-picture that allows it to connect to security cameras.
translation: 一种带有独立原子能源的辐射王牌电视机。一些幸存者似乎接管了一些旧电视台，一些机器人正在维护动画频道。它有一个内置的画中画，允许它连接到安全摄像头。

original: A Radiation King brand television. Some survivors seem to have taken some old television stations over, and some robots are maintaining animation channels. It has a built in picture-in-picture that allows it to connect to security cameras.
translation: 辐射王牌电视机。一些幸存者似乎接管了一些旧电视台，一些机器人正在维护动画频道。它有一个内置的画中画，允许它连接到安全摄像头。

original: A Rockwell BigBazooka rocket launcher, with the deluxe 3 lb. trigger. Fires BigBazooka Rockets
translation: 罗克韦尔大火箭筒火箭发射器，豪华3磅。触发。发射大火箭筒火箭

original: A Rockwell CZ53 Personal Minigun. A multi-barrelled chaingun firing 5mm ammunition at over 60,000 RPM. It does not require power to rotate.
translation: 罗克韦尔CZ53小型手枪。一种以60000转/分的速度发射5毫米弹药的多管链枪。旋转不需要动力。

original: A Sig-Sauer 14mm Auto Pistol. Large, singleshot handgun. Excellent craftsmanship
translation: Sig Sauer 14毫米自动手枪。大型单发手枪。精湛的工艺

original: A Super Sledgehammer, manufactured by the Gun Runners, using the finest weapon technology available. Includes a kinetic energy storage device to increase damage and knockback.
translation: 一种超级大锤，由运枪者制造，采用最先进的武器技术。包括一个动能储存装置，以增加伤害和击退。

original: A T-45 power helmet. Bulky, but it works
A Wattz 1000 Laser Pistol. Civilian model, so the wattage is lower than military or police versions. Uses batteries.
translation: 沃特兹1000激光手枪。民用型号，所以瓦数低于军用或警用型号。使用电池。

original: A Wattz 2000 Laser Rifle. Uses a UPS for more powerful lasers, and an extended barrel for additional range.
translation: 沃特兹2000激光步枪。使用UPS提供更强大的激光，并使用扩展桶提供额外的射程。

original: A Winchester City-Killer 12 gauge combat shotgun, bullpup variant. It has the optional DesertWarfare environmental sealant modification for extra reliability.
translation: 温彻斯特市杀手12口径战斗猎枪，牛头犬变种。它有可选的环境密封修改额外的可靠性。

original: A Winchester Model P94 plasma caster. An industrial-grade energy weapon, firing superheated bolts of plasma down a superconducting barrel. Powered by microfusion cells.
translation: 温彻斯特P94型等离子连铸机。一种工业级能量武器，向超导管发射过热的等离子体。由微融合细胞提供动力。

original: A Winchester Model P94-B plasma rifle. An industrial-grade energy weapon, firing superheated bolts of plasma down a superconducting barrel. Powered by microfusion cells.
translation: 温彻斯特P94-B型等离子步枪。一种工业级能量武器，向超导管发射过热的等离子体。由微融合细胞提供动力。

original: A Winchester Widowmaker double-barreled 12 gauge shotgun. A short barrel, with mahogany grip
translation: 温彻斯特守寡者双管12口径猎枪。有桃花心木柄的短桶

original: A baby mutant mantis about the size of a rat.
translation: 一只老鼠大小的变异螳螂宝宝。

original: A basic helmet, designed for use with the the T-51b Power Helmet.  Offers excellent protection from both attacks and environmental hazards.  Like all DoubleTech power armor, the control and climate-regulation systems require direct skin contact.
translation: 一种基本头盔，设计用于T-51b电动头盔。提供出色的保护，免受攻击和环境危害。像所有DoubleTech动力装甲一样，控制和气候调节系统需要直接皮肤接触。

original: A biography of the Masticator, New Reno's greatest boxer. It covers his style of fighting in great detail.
translation: 新里诺最伟大的拳击手，咀嚼者的传记。它非常详细地描述了他的战斗风格。

original: A black and white plaid suit. Perfect for gamblers, or those just gambling with destiny.
translation: 黑白格子西装。完美的赌徒，或那些只是赌博的命运。

original: A black jumpsuit worn by Enclave personel. Its not very warm, and is meant to be worn under their armor.
translation: 飞地人穿的黑色连体衣。它不是很暖和，应该穿在他们的盔甲下。

original: A blue 250 ml flask with the number 13 painted yellow on it. You don't know why, but you want to take a drink from it.
translation: 一个250毫升的蓝色烧瓶，上面涂有黄色的数字13。你不知道为什么，但你想喝一杯。

original: A bolt-action .223 rifle. It's popular for hunting vermin.
translation: 枪法。223步枪。它很流行用来猎杀害虫。

original: A book of DIY weapon projects, endorsed by the government to help every citizen be knowledgable 'at a moments notice.'
translation: 一本关于DIY武器项目的书，得到了政府的认可，帮助每一个公民“在一瞬间”变得有知识

original: A book of stories from a fictional apocalyptic town. In between the anecdotes are some actually good tips on running a business, and some recipes for 'iguana'...
translation: 一本虚构的世界末日小镇的故事书。在这些轶事之间，有一些关于经营企业的好建议，还有一些“鬣蜥”的食谱。。。

original: A bottle of Gamma Gulp beer. It glows in the dark!
translation: 一瓶伽马啤酒。它在黑暗中发光！

original: A bottle of Roentgen rum. It glows in the dark!
translation: 一瓶伦琴朗姆酒。它在黑暗中发光！

original: A box full of gears and cogs, meant to be used with a crank action mechanism or similar clockwork weapon.
translation: 装有齿轮和齿轮的盒子，用于曲柄机构或类似的发条武器。

original: A box magazine meant to feed into a 10mm minigun.
translation: 一个盒式弹匣，用来装10毫米口径的微型枪。

original: A broken Protectron.  Much less threatening now that it's quiet and still.  Could be gutted for parts, or repaired into a working model.
translation: 一个坏掉的防护罩。现在已经安静下来了，威胁小多了。可以挖出零件，或者修复成工作模型。

original: A bulk 5mm round, typically used in miniguns and select rifles. These rounds are made cheap, with a low powder load. This means less recoil, but also less penetration and damage. Still, very plentiful.
translation: 一种体积为5毫米的子弹，通常用于小型手枪和精选步枪。这些子弹很便宜，火药含量很低。这意味着更少的反冲，但也更少的渗透和伤害。不过，还是非常丰富。

original: A burlap sack and a pair of goggles, turned into a menacing mask.
translation: 一个粗麻袋和一副护目镜，变成了一个危险的面具。

original: A busted up eyebot, no longer playing the radio tunes. You could fix it up, and change the stations.
translation: 一个坏掉的眼珠，不再播放收音机的曲子。你可以把它修好，换台。

original: A canister from a spent 70mm shell.
translation: 一个用了70毫米炮弹的罐子。

original: A canned pork product that is unnaturally pink, oddly rubbery, and not very tasty, this CRAM remains quite filling. It's not very good at all on it's own, but it lasts forever, and theres 1001 recipes that can use it.
translation: 猪肉罐头产品，是不自然的粉红色，奇怪的橡胶，不是很好吃，这个填鸭仍然相当填补。单靠它一点都不好，但它是永恒的，有1001种食谱可以使用它。

original: A carefully folded raw skin harvested from a gecko.  You can cure it for storage and tanning, or eat it if you're desperate enough.
translation: 壁虎皮从壁虎身上精心折叠的生皮。你可以治愈它的储存和晒黑，或吃它，如果你够绝望。

original: A carefully folded, raw, shiny skin harvested from a golden gecko.  You can cure it for storage and tanning, or eat it if you're desperate enough.
translation: 从金壁虎身上精心折叠的、生的、有光泽的皮肤。你可以治愈它的储存和晒黑，或吃它，如果你够绝望。

original: A chinese make of assault rifle, rechambered to 5.56 to allow infiltrators to easily restock ammo at american gun stores.
translation: 一种中国制造的突击步枪，重新调高到5.56，以便渗透者在美国枪支商店轻松补充弹药。

original: A civil war era cannon. Incredibly heavy, loud, and large. It should still punch a whole in just about anything.
translation: 内战时期的大炮。难以置信的沉重，响亮，巨大。它仍然应该在几乎任何事情上打一个整体。

original: A classic paper firework rocket. This one explodes in an extra bright blast. Normally, these babies would be reserved for the finale of a fireworks show... and fired into low orbit instead of at the viewing crowd.
translation: 经典的纸烟火火箭。这一个在一个额外的明亮爆炸。通常，这些孩子会被留到焰火表演的最后。。。向低轨道发射而不是向观众发射。

original: A classic paper firework rocket.. Not the best for demolitions, but it starts fires, and leaves a trail of fire behind it. Made in china.
translation: 经典的纸烟火火箭。。不是最好的拆除，但它会引发火灾，并留下火迹。中国制造。

original: A classic paper firework rocket.. Not the best for demolitions, but its better than nothing.
translation: 经典的纸烟火火箭。。不是最好的拆除，但总比没有好。

original: A classic rifle, chambered in .45-70 ammunition. The ammo sacrifices long ranged accuracy for sheer damage. Popular among Veteran Desert Rangers, this one is an experimental model produced by the Gun Runners.
translation: 一支经典的步枪，子弹为45-70。这种弹药会牺牲远程精确性来造成绝对的伤害。在资深的沙漠巡游者中很受欢迎，这是一个由跑枪者制作的实验模型。

original: A classic rifle, chambered in .45-70 ammunition. The ammo sacrifices long ranged accuracy for sheer damage. Popular among Veteran Desert Rangers.
translation: 一支经典的步枪，子弹为45-70。这种弹药会牺牲远程精确性来造成绝对的伤害。在老兵中很受欢迎。

original: A colossal green ant with a bulging, bloated thorax.  It moves slowly and deliberately, tending to nearby eggs and continually laying more. Much like it's minions, it emits antifungal clouds.
translation: 一种巨大的绿色蚂蚁，胸部膨胀。它缓慢而有意识地移动，倾向于附近的卵，并不断产卵。就像它的爪牙一样，它散发出抗真菌的云。

original: A colossal wheel that could smash cars if you wanted.
translation: 一个巨大的轮子，如果你想的话，它可以砸碎汽车。

original: A colossal wheel used on monster trucks.
translation: 巨型卡车上使用的巨大车轮。

original: A colossal, egg-swollen mutant chameleon. Unable to cloak itself, but lethally powerful. This one seems to be the mother.
translation: 一种巨大的、卵子膨胀的变异变色龙。无法隐藏自己，但致命的力量。这个好像是妈妈。

original: A comic about a hero with oceanic superpowers and swimming skill. Criminally underrated to some, to others absolutely horrible
translation: 一部关于一个拥有海洋超能力和游泳技巧的英雄的漫画。对某些人来说被刑事低估，对另一些人来说绝对可怕

original: A comic based around sci fi horror stories. In this issue, stories include... Dead rising from their graves, Mushroom Men, and a blob eating everything... Yeesh.
translation: 以科幻恐怖故事为基础的漫画。在本期中，故事包括。。。从坟墓里爬起来的死人，蘑菇人，还有一个吃东西的家伙。。。是的。

original: A common .357 magnum revolver, customized at the core. This design is somewhat more compact, and feels strange when you hold it at the ready. It has a playing card pattern on the grip.
translation: 一个普通的.357万能左轮手枪，在核心定制。这种设计比较紧凑，当你准备好的时候感觉很奇怪。把手上有扑克牌图案。

original: A common .357 six-shooter, used by crooks and the likes. It is very popular due to it's modular nature.
translation: 一种普通的.357六发手枪，被骗子之类的人用过。它是非常流行的，因为它的模块化性质。

original: A common .45-70 five-shooter, used by Desert Rangers, big surprise. It is engraved with gold. They are given to veteran rangers as a thank you for service.
translation: 一个普通的45-70五发枪，沙漠巡游者用的，大惊喜。上面刻着金子。它们是送给老兵的，作为对你们服务的感谢。

original: A common iguana; a popular pet, and even more popular food source.
translation: 一种普通的鬣蜥；一种受欢迎的宠物，甚至更受欢迎的食物来源。

original: A compact 10-round magazine for the Colt Rangemaster.
translation: 一个紧凑的10轮杂志为小马Rangemaster。

original: A compact 12-round magazine for the Winchester City-Killer combat shotgun..
translation: 温彻斯特市杀手战斗猎枪的12发弹匣。。

original: A compact 30-round magazine for the Derringer RF2076.
translation: 一个紧凑的30轮德林格RF2076杂志。

original: A compact 80-round drum for the Derringer RF2076.
translation: 一个紧凑的80圆鼓的德林格RF2076。

original: A compact, grey magazine made just for the H&K MP9.
translation: 一个紧凑的，灰色杂志专为H&K MP9。

original: A complete guide to Arroyo Style combat.
translation: 阿罗约式战斗的完整指南。

original: A complete guide to Gecko Hunting.
A complete kit for a revolver rifle. Perfect for when you want to make your life in a hostile frontier. Come to think about it, thats the whole world now, isn't it?
translation: 左轮手枪的成套装备。当你想让你的生活在一个充满敌意的边疆时，这是完美的选择。想想看，这就是现在的世界，不是吗？

original: A complete kit to make a lever-action firearm. Great for aspiring cowboys!
translation: 制造杠杆式火器的成套工具。非常适合有抱负的牛仔！

original: A crude facsimile of a civil war era cannon. Incredibly heavy, loud, and large. It should still punch a whole in just about anything.
translation: 内战时期大炮的粗糙复制品。难以置信的沉重，响亮，巨大。它仍然应该在几乎任何事情上打一个整体。

original: A custom pair of gauntlets made using old meathooks to make a brutal, yet effective weapon. You could possibly use the curves of the hooks to parry attacks.
translation: 一种用旧的肉钩制成的特制手套，用来制造一种残忍但有效的武器。你可以用钩子的曲线来招架攻击。

original: A custom, crank-action minigun, tooled for .22 ammo. You can wield it as is, or mount it on a vehicle.
translation: 一把定制的曲柄式微型枪，可装点22弹药。你可以按原样使用它，或者把它安装在车辆上。

original: A custom, crank-action minigun, tooled for .45 ammo. You can wield it as is, or mount it on a vehicle.
translation: 一种定制的，曲柄动作的微型枪，用来装45发子弹。你可以按原样挥舞它，或者把它装在车上。

original: A custom, heavily modified Cowboy Repeater. Has more room for ammo, and is generally more optimized.
translation: 一个定制的，经过大量修改的牛仔中继器。有更大的弹药空间，而且通常更优化。

original: A cylinder for a revolver. Usful for gun crafting.
translation: 左轮手枪的圆筒。用于制造枪支。

original: A dark blue painted eyebot, who plays a violin-filled radio station, with occasional news reports. You can't tell if theyre automated, or the minutemen really have a fortress somewhere.
translation: 一个深蓝色的眼睛，他演奏着小提琴充满电台，偶尔有新闻报道。你不知道他们是自动化的，还是民兵真的有要塞。

original: A deck of 52 playing cards, in a unique style used by merchants out west. Or, they were, in the pre-cataclysm times. These feel well loved, like many-a games of caravan were played with them.
translation: 一副52张扑克牌，风格独特，为西部商人所用。或者，在大灾变之前。这些人感觉很受欢迎，就像很多人一样——他们玩着一场商队游戏。

original: A delicious golden brown serving of crispy fried mirelurk. The cooking removed the mutagenic properties, so you wont become a hideous fish beast.
translation: 一份美味的金黄色的酥炸玉米饼。烹饪去除了诱变特性，所以你不会成为一个可怕的鱼野兽。

original: A design document full of the basic Gun Runner loads of ammunition. This was released to the general public shortly before the Cataclysm,as a publicity stunt. Now you too can make bullets like a professional!
translation: 一份设计文件，里面装满了基本的弹药。这是在大灾变前不久向公众发布的，作为一种宣传噱头。现在你也可以像专业人士一样制造子弹了！

original: A dog-sized egg sac from a giant mantis. Incredibly gross. It shakes as if it's about to hatch!
translation: 大螳螂的狗大小的卵囊。真恶心。它摇晃着，好像要孵化似的！

original: A fist-sized egg from a gecko.
A fist-sized egg from a radscorpion.  Incredibly gross.
translation: 蝎子的拳头大小的蛋。真恶心。

original: A flagpole reworked into a bludgeoning staff. The golden eagle at the end has been properly reinforced so that the gold wont break or deform with continued use.
translation: 一根旗杆被改造成一根棍棒。末端的金鹰被适当加固，这样黄金在继续使用时不会断裂或变形。

original: A floating little round robot with no form of attacks. It plays a patriotic radio station, with new updates from President John Henry Eden.
translation: 一个漂浮的小圆机器人，没有攻击。它播放的是一个爱国电台，有约翰·亨利·伊登总统的最新消息。

original: A fruit of a slight purple tinge that resembles an apple.
translation: 略带紫色的水果，类似苹果。

original: A generic reciever for a firearm. Youre sure they have to come in more varieties than this, but this one seems like it will work for anything. Oh joyous day.
translation: 普通的火器接受器。你肯定它们的品种要比这个多，但这个似乎对任何东西都有用。哦，快乐的一天。

original: A giant mutated emperor scorpion.  A highly venomous nightmare come to life.
translation: 一只巨大的变异天蝎。一个剧毒的恶梦出现了。

original: A golden coin from a post-cataclysm civilization out west. How it got here, you don't know.
translation: 一枚来自西部大灾难后文明的金币。你不知道它是怎么来的。

original: A great general's hat. Perfect for attacking Russia when you really shouldn't attack Russia.
translation: 伟大将军的帽子。当你真的不应该攻击俄罗斯的时候，非常适合攻击俄罗斯。

original: A great general's hat. Respect the man wearing this.
translation: 伟大将军的帽子。尊重穿这个的人。

original: A green jumpsuit with Chinese flag patches on it. Seems to have been worn by a chinese infiltrator.
translation: 一件上面有中国国旗图案的绿色连身衣。好像是一个中国渗透者穿的。

original: A green plastic dinosaur. When you think about it, its a dinosaur made of dinosaur corpses.
translation: 绿色塑料恐龙。仔细想想，它是由恐龙尸体组成的恐龙。

original: A handcrafted, four barreled flintlock. Incredibly simple, not very durable.
translation: 手工制作的四筒燧石。非常简单，不太耐用。

original: A handcrafted, yet noticably modern, flintlock pistol. Being hastily thrown together from scrap, its not horribly durable, but itll do.
translation: 一把手工制作，但引人注目的现代燧石手枪。被匆忙地从废料中拼凑起来，它的耐久性并不可怕，但它会的。

original: A handmade .223 rifle that utilizes a bolt-action mechanism.
translation: 一种手工制造的.223步枪，使用一个螺栓作用机构。

original: A handmade .223 rifle that utilizes a lever-action mechanism.
translation: 一种手工制造的.223步枪，使用杠杆作用机构。

original: A handmade .223 rifle that utilizes a pump-action mechanism.
translation: 一种手工制造的.223步枪，使用泵作用机构。

original: A handmade .223 rifle that utilizes a revolver cylinder to chamber each round.
translation: 一种手工制造的0.223口径步枪，每发子弹都有一个左轮手枪筒。

original: A handmade .308 rifle that utilizes a bolt-action mechanism.
translation: 一种手工制造的.308步枪，使用一个螺栓作用机构。

original: A handmade .308 rifle that utilizes a lever-action mechanism.
translation: 一种手工制造的.308步枪，使用杠杆作用机构。

original: A handmade .308 rifle that utilizes a pump-action mechanism.
translation: 一种手工制造的.308步枪，使用泵作用机构。

original: A handmade .308 rifle that utilizes a revolver cylinder to chamber each round.
translation: 一种手工制造的0.308口径的步枪，每发子弹都有一个左轮手枪筒。

original: A handmade .50 rifle that utilizes a bolt-action mechanism. Its more fragile, and more dangerous, compared to similar revolver rifles.
translation: 一种手工制造的0.50步枪，使用一个螺栓作用机构。与类似的左轮手枪相比，它更脆弱，更危险。

original: A handmade .50 rifle that utilizes a lever-action mechanism. Its more fragile, and more dangerous, compared to similar revolver rifles.
translation: 一种手工制造的.50步枪，使用杠杆作用机构。与类似的左轮手枪相比，它更脆弱，更危险。

original: A handmade .50 rifle that utilizes a revolver cylinder to chamber each round. Its more fragile, and more dangerous, compared to similar revolver rifles.
translation: 一种手工制造的0.50口径的步枪，每发子弹都用一个左轮手枪筒来射击。与类似的左轮手枪相比，它更脆弱，更危险。

original: A handmade 12 gauge shotgun that utilizes a pump-action mechanism.
translation: 一种手工制作的12口径猎枪，采用泵作用机构。

original: A handmade 20 gauge shotgun that utilizes a pump-action mechanism.
translation: 一种手工制作的20口径猎枪，采用泵作用机构。

original: A handmade 7.62 rifle that utilizes a bolt-action mechanism.
translation: 一种手工制作的7.62步枪，采用螺栓作用机制。

original: A handmade 7.62 rifle that utilizes a lever-action mechanism.
translation: 一种手工制作的7.62步枪，采用杠杆作用机制。

original: A handmade 7.62 rifle that utilizes a revolver cylinder to chamber each round.
translation: 一种手工制作的7.62口径步枪，每发子弹都有一个左轮手枪筒。

original: A hazmat suit made to protect from foreign materials. It is incredibly durable compared to other similar models, though its a bit bulkier. It needs a separate gas mask.
translation: 用来防止外来物质进入的防毒服。与其他类似车型相比，这款车非常耐用，不过它有点笨重。它需要一个单独的防毒面具。

original: A heavy duty freezer, used for transporting fish, meat and other sensitive perishables in trucks.
translation: 一种重型冷冻柜，用于用卡车运输鱼、肉和其他易腐烂的物品。

original: A heavy duty fridge, used for transporting meat and other perishables in trucks.
translation: 一种重型冰箱，用于用卡车运输肉类和其他易腐物品。

original: A heavy helmet that provides excellent protection from all sorts of damage.
translation: 一种能提供很好的保护免受各种伤害的重型头盔。

original: A heavy metal slug used with shotguns to give them the range capabilities of a rifle.  Extremely damaging but rather inaccurate.
translation: 一种重金属弹头，与猎枪配合使用，使其具有步枪的射程能力。极其有害，但相当不准确。

original: A heavy winterized helmet that provides excellent protection from all sorts of damage.
translation: 一种厚重的防寒头盔，能提供极好的保护免受各种伤害。

original: A heavy, round helmet that provides excellent protection from blunt impacts.
translation: 一种很重的圆形头盔，能很好地防止钝器的撞击。

original: A homage to one of history's mistakes, this pistol is meant to try and improve upon the failed design of the Duck's Foot, by removing a barrel so one faces forwards, and slightly improving the angle of the side barrels.
translation: 为了纪念历史上的一个错误，这把手枪是为了试图改善失败的设计鸭脚，通过删除一个桶，使一个面向前方，并略有改善的角度侧桶。

original: A homemade bolt-action mechanism, used in sniper rifles.
translation: 一种自制的螺栓作用机构，用于狙击步枪。

original: A homemade crank, as used in gatling guns.
translation: 一种自制的曲柄，如用于转管机枪。

original: A homemade mask slash helmet made of a regular gas mask and gecko skin, with tinted glass eyeholes so you don't get blood and sun in your eyes.
translation: 自制的防毒面具和壁虎皮制成的头盔，带有有色玻璃眼，这样你的眼睛里就不会有血液和阳光。

original: A homemade mask slash helmet, made of a regular gas mask and golden gecko skin, with tinted glass eyeholes so you don't get blood and sun in your eyes. Is the air acid? Well not anymore!
translation: 自制的防毒面具和头盔，由普通的防毒面具和金色的壁虎皮制成，带有有色的玻璃眼，这样你的眼睛里就不会有血液和阳光。空气是酸的吗？再也不会了！

original: A homemade mechanism, based around a liver, commonly used in old west shotguns and rifles.
translation: 一种自制的机械装置，以肝脏为基础，常用于古老的西部猎枪和步枪。

original: A homemade pump that can be used to chamber the next round in a shotgun, or rarely, a rifle.
translation: 一种自制的泵，可以用来在散弹枪或步枪中进行下一轮射击。

original: A homemade set of parts used in automatic and semi-automatic weapons.
translation: 一套自制的零件，用于自动和半自动武器。

original: A homemade trigger mechanism, used in crafting weaponry.
translation: 自制的触发装置，用于制造武器。

original: A huge and hairy green ant almost twice the size of other giant ants.  Bulging pincers extend from its jaws. It emits clouds of strong fungicide to protect the queen.
translation: 一种巨大多毛的绿色蚂蚁，几乎是其他巨型蚂蚁的两倍大。凸出的钳子从钳口伸出。它散发出浓浓的杀菌剂云来保护女王。

original: A jacket made from thick leather.  Cumbersome, but offers excellent protection from cuts. Its decorated with a flame pattern, and has the image of a skull with the words 'Great Khans' on the back. The sleeves were cut off. Brutal.
translation: 用厚皮革制成的夹克。笨重，但提供良好的保护，从削减。它用火焰图案装饰，背面有“大汗”字样的头骨图像。袖子被剪掉了。残酷的。

original: A jacket made from thick leather.  Cumbersome, but offers excellent protection from cuts. On the back is the image of a crown with the words 'The Kings' written in it. Hail to the king, baby.
translation: 用厚皮革制成的夹克。笨重，但提供良好的保护，从削减。背面是王冠的图案，上面写着“国王”。向国王致敬，宝贝。

original: A jacket made from thick leather.  Cumbersome, but offers excellent protection from cuts. On the back is the image of a mushroom cloud and a cat, with the words 'atom cats' printed. You feel like a cool cat just wearing this.
translation: 用厚皮革制成的夹克。笨重，但提供良好的保护，从削减。背面是蘑菇云和猫的图像，上面印着“原子猫”的字样。你穿上这个就觉得自己很酷。

original: A jacket made from thick leather.  Cumbersome, but offers excellent protection from cuts. On the back is the image of a snake contorted into an 's'. The jacket makes you feel like you rule.
translation: 用厚皮革制成的夹克。笨重，但提供良好的保护，从削减。背面是一条蛇扭曲成“s”形的图像。这件夹克让你觉得自己是统治者。

original: A kit to make a homemade pump-action shotgun. Commonly sold in backwater towns, to the redneck who wants pride in his boomstick.
translation: 一套自制的泵动猎枪。通常在穷乡僻壤的城镇出售，卖给那些想以自己的手杖为荣的乡巴佬。

original: A large book about DIY gunsmithing. The back of the book brags about how its 'Banned in California and most other countries'. The book covers every step of gunsmithing, including parts normally made by machines, and how to make them by hand. Theres a lengthy disclaimer about gun laws in the front, but there are no police to arrest you for breaking gun laws now.
translation: 一本关于自制枪械的大书。这本书的背面吹嘘它是如何“在加利福尼亚和其他大多数国家被禁止的”。这本书涵盖了枪械制造的每一个步骤，包括通常由机器制造的零件，以及如何手工制造。前面有一个冗长的关于枪支法的免责声明，但是现在没有警察因为你违反枪支法而逮捕你。

original: A large canister from a spent 105mm shell, now an expensive paperweight. You might find the stuff to reload it one day.
translation: 一个用过的105毫米炮弹制成的大罐子，现在是一个昂贵的镇纸。总有一天你会找到重新装填的东西。

original: A large canister from a spent 140mm shell, now an expensive paperweight. You might find the stuff to reload it one day.
translation: 一个140毫米弹壳的大罐子，现在是一个昂贵的镇纸。总有一天你会找到重新装填的东西。

original: A large die-cast nuka-cola truck. Perfect for city dioramas, or just display.
translation: 一辆大型压铸努卡可乐卡车。完美的城市透视，或只是展示。

original: A large nylon bag. You remember people making a big stink about these back before the cataclysm.
translation: 一个大尼龙袋。你还记得大灾变前人们对这些东西大发脾气。

original: A large, aggressive rat around the size of the cow. While menacing and aggressive, this can be reduced with food and training.
translation: 一种像母牛大小的大而有攻击性的老鼠。虽然威胁和侵略性，这可以减少与食物和训练。

original: A large, mutant chameleon. Unable to cloak itself, but lethally powerful.
translation: 变色龙一种变异的大型变色龙。无法隐藏自己，但致命的力量。

original: A large, mutant chameleon. Unable to cloak itself, but lethally powerful. It glows with radiation.
translation: 变色龙一种变异的大型变色龙。无法隐藏自己，但致命的力量。它发出辐射。

original: A large, mutant chameleon. Unable to cloak itself, but lethally powerful. It is much more powerful
translation: 变色龙一种变异的大型变色龙。无法隐藏自己，但致命的力量。它更强大

original: A large, mutant gecko. It leaves behind a trail of acidic spit.
translation: 一种巨大的变异壁虎。它会留下一道酸性唾液。

original: A large, slightly mutated black rat. It is very dangerous in large numbers, but alone, is pretty weak.
translation: 一只大的，有点变异的黑老鼠。这是非常危险的大量，但单独，是相当薄弱的。

original: A large-sized egg from a deathclaw.
A larger magazine for the Colt Rangemaster. It carries 20 rounds.
translation: 一个更大的杂志给小马牧场主。它有20发子弹。

original: A leather cap used by Legion recruits, combined with some form of tinted eyewear and a bandana for best effect.
translation: 一种军团新兵用的皮帽子，配上某种颜色的眼镜和头巾以达到最佳效果。

original: A leather cap used by Prime-ranked legionarries, often combined with some form of tinted eyewear and a bandana for best effect.
translation: 军帽一种上等军人使用的皮帽子，常与某种有色眼镜和头巾结合以达到最佳效果。

original: A leather flight jacket covered in military medals.
translation: 一种覆盖着军事奖章的皮制飞行夹克。

original: A leopard-print nightshirt. For when you want to show your sexual prowess in a tacky, yet oddly endearing way.
translation: 豹纹睡衣。当你想以一种俗气却又古怪可爱的方式展示你的性能力时。

original: A light brown leather full-length duster, worn by the Commonwealth Minutemen, a small, presumably dead group of militiamen.
translation: 一种浅棕色皮革的全身掸子，由英联邦民兵穿，民兵是一小群可能已经死亡的民兵。

original: A light, single-edged sword from the revolutionary war. You feel it will cut the dead just as well as it cut redcoats.
translation: 革命战争中的一把单刀。你觉得它能像割红大衣一样割死人。

original: A light, wooden grip for a firearm.
A little known flavor of Nuka-Cola which is only available from the ''crazy naked man''. It has an ''interesting'' bouquet.
translation: 一种鲜为人知的努卡可乐，只有“疯狂裸体男人”才能提供。它有一个“有趣”的花束。

original: A man-sized crustacean clad in an iron-like chitin, found within swamps and rivers. Their meat is popular with the fishers of the endtimes. Rumor has it some survivors have even tried to set up farms for them.
translation: 甲壳类动物一种人大小的甲壳类动物，包着像甲壳素一样的铁，发现于沼泽和河流中。他们的肉很受时代渔民的欢迎。有传言说，一些幸存者甚至试图为他们建立农场。

original: A man-sized crustacean clad in soft, underdeveloped chitin.  Often spotted in the water, of course.
translation: 一种人大小的甲壳类动物，身上覆盖着柔软的未发育的甲壳质。当然，经常在水里被发现。

original: A massive and extremely powerful V12 engine, for when your deathmobile needs to take a Quantum Leap.
translation: 一个巨大且极其强大的V12引擎，当你的死亡手机需要进行量子跳跃时。

original: A massive cargo fridge.  When turned on, it will cool the food inside, extended the time until the food spoils.
translation: 巨大的货物冰箱。打开后，它会冷却里面的食物，延长时间，直到食物变质。

original: A massive electric motor, used to power the XVBO2 Vertibird.  Known for its high rate of power consumption.
translation: 一个巨大的电动机，用来驱动XVBO2 Vertibird。以高功耗著称。

original: A massive shell filled with gunpowder and pellets.
translation: 装满火药和弹丸的巨大炮弹。

original: A massive shell with a single, large chunk of lead within. This baby could punch a hole in a tank
translation: 一个巨大的贝壳，里面有一大块铅。这个婴儿能在坦克上打洞

original: A massive, explosive, cast-iron cannonball. On impact, it explodes into fragments
translation: 一种巨大的、爆炸性的铸铁炮弹。撞击时，它会爆炸成碎片

original: A military-grade rotor from a vertibird. It's motor is built in.
translation: 眩晕战机的军用旋翼。它的马达是内置的。

original: A mirelurk egg. Prized by many for its specific taste
translation: 一个蛋。因其独特的口味而被许多人珍视

original: A mutant mantis the size of a small dog, brought in from the west coast to deal with pest problems.
translation: 一种变异的螳螂，有小狗那么大，从西海岸带过来处理害虫问题。

original: A mysterious alien rifle, capable of incredible damage.
translation: 一支神秘的外星来复枪，能造成难以置信的伤害。

original: A nutritious and delicious hearty Mirelurk soup.
translation: 营养丰富，美味可口的米勒鲁克汤。

original: A pair of brown pants with two deep pockets.
translation: 一条有两个深口袋的棕色裤子。

original: A pair of leapard-print pajama pants. Perfect for seduction, or just sleeping.
translation: 一条leapard印花睡裤。完美的诱惑，或只是睡觉。

original: A pair of simple boxing gloves, meant to pad attacks so you don't kill people or hurt yourself. Contrary to this original purpose, these ones have steel plates inserted in them, allowing for some rather brutal punches.
translation: 一副简单的拳击手套，用来垫攻击，这样你就不会杀人或伤害自己。与这个最初的目的相反，这些有钢板插入其中，允许一些相当残酷的拳。

original: A pair of simple boxing gloves, meant to pad attacks so you don't kill people, or hurt your fists. Kinda useless now.
translation: 一副简单的拳击手套，用来垫击，这样你就不会杀人，也不会伤到你的拳头。现在有点没用了。

original: A pair of special boxing gloves plated externally with gold. They were a ceremonial prize, never meant for actual use, but theyre incredibly heavy.
translation: 一副镀金的拳击手套。它们是一种仪式上的奖品，从来没有真正的用途，但它们是难以置信的沉重。

original: A pair of special boxing gloves plated externally with gold. They were a ceremonial prize, never meant for actual use, but theyre incredibly heavy. To top that off, somebody added steel inserts to make them even heavier.
translation: 一副镀金的拳击手套。它们是一种仪式上的奖品，从来没有真正的用途，但它们是难以置信的沉重。最重要的是，有人增加了钢插入，使他们更重。

original: A pair of tough gecko-skin arm guards.  Light and comfortable.
translation: 一对结实的壁虎皮护臂。轻盈舒适。

original: A pair of tough golden gecko-skin arm guards.  Light and comfortable. Perfect for plunging your arm into an acid anthill.
translation: 一对坚韧的金色壁虎皮护臂。轻盈舒适。完美的插入酸蚁丘你的手臂。

original: A paper-mache mask in the image of a psychotic-looking clown. Its modelled after the infamous serial killer.
translation: 一个看起来像精神病小丑的纸面具。它模仿了臭名昭著的连环杀手。

original: A paper-mache mask in the image of a psychotic-looking clown. Its modelled after the infamous serial killer. Something feels... off about this one.
translation: 一个看起来像精神病小丑的纸面具。它模仿了臭名昭著的连环杀手。有种感觉。。。关于这件事。

original: A plastic and iron baseball helmet used by Legion veterans, combined with some form of tinted eyewear and a bandana for best effect.
translation: 退伍军人用的塑料和铁的棒球帽，加上某种颜色的眼镜和头巾以达到最佳效果。

original: A plastic shell in the shape of a nuka-cola bottle. It has a glass bottle inside it... It doesn't pour well.
translation: 努卡可乐瓶形状的塑料外壳。里面有个玻璃瓶。。。倒得不好。

original: A popular book from the pre-cataclysm days, this book contains several guides to nuclear powered gadgets, all without the use of a transistor! Sponsored by Radiation King.
translation: 一本流行的书从灾难前的日子，这本书包含了几个指南，以核动力的小工具，都没有使用晶体管！由辐射王赞助。

original: A popular book from the pre-cataclysm days, this book contains several guides to nuclear powered gadgets, all without the use of a transistor! The limited Vault Boy edition has illustrations featuring everyone's favorite Vault Dweller, and a couple bonus recipes for the Vault Mechanics out there.
translation: 一本流行的书从灾难前的日子，这本书包含了几个指南，以核动力的小工具，都没有使用晶体管！限量版的金库男孩有插图显示每个人最喜欢的金库居民，和一对夫妇的金库力学奖金食谱在那里。

original: A popular compact carbine, long used by paradroopers in the U.S. air force. Its incredibly accurate and fires in decently sized bursts.
translation: 卡宾枪一种流行的小型卡宾枪，长期被美国空军的骑兵使用。它的精确性令人难以置信，而且能以相当大的爆发力开火。

original: A popular specialty revolver of the Gun Runners, chambered in .223. Popular among officer and criminal alike, it got the reputation of 'That Gun', due to it's recognizable appearance.
translation: 一种很受欢迎的专业左轮手枪，位于.223室。它在警察和罪犯中都很受欢迎，因为它的外观很容易辨认，所以有“那把枪”的美誉。

original: A popular young boy's comic series which features outlandish melee feats from knights of yore. Stories include 'The Greatest Crusade' and 'Quest of the Golden Chalice'.
translation: 一个受欢迎的年轻男孩的漫画系列，其特点是古怪的近战壮举从过去的骑士。故事包括“最伟大的十字军东征”和“金杯之旅”。

original: A popular, small .22 pistol with an intergrated silencer. Commonly used by assassins.
translation: 一种流行的，小型的，带集成消音器的.22手枪。刺客常用的。

original: A powerful 6-cylinder engine, powered by the sweet power of Nuka Cola
translation: 一个强大的6缸发动机，由努卡可乐的甜蜜力量提供动力
一个强大的8缸努卡发动机。

original: A printed copy of the Fallout Bible by Chris Avellone. A mix between a definitive, unambigous guide to Fallout lore, and an extended Q&A session with fans, its technically noncanon because of a change in developers, but who cares? This lore is a lot better.
translation: 克里斯·阿维隆的《辐射圣经》印刷本。一个明确无误的散播知识指南，一个与粉丝们的问答环节，从技术上讲，这是因为开发者的改变，但谁在乎呢？这个传说好多了。

original: A prototype from the Hopeville branch of the Gun Runners, this shoulder mounted machine gun is essentially a shoulder-mounted minigun. It is chamberered to use 10mm rounds and has a low rate of fire compared to other heavy automatic weapons.
translation: 一个原型从霍普韦尔分支的枪跑，这种肩装机枪本质上是一个肩装微型枪。与其他重型自动武器相比，它有10毫米口径的子弹，射速很低。

original: A pulsating sausage of glistening white flesh, the size of a large cat.  On one end is a set of squirming mouth parts.
translation: 一种跳动的香肠，由闪闪发光的白肉组成，有一只大猫那么大。一端是一组蠕动的嘴。

original: A punt gun made by hand with loving care.
translation: 用手工精心制作的平底船用枪。

original: A rather rare and powerful pistol cartridge, popularized by military and police forces after the release of the Colt 6250. Hollow points deal more damage against softer targets.
translation: 一种相当罕见且威力强大的手枪子弹，在柯尔特6250被释放后被军队和警察部队推广。空心点对较软的目标造成更大的伤害。

original: A rather rare and powerful pistol cartridge, popularized by military and police forces after the release of the Colt 6250. It is interchangable with .40 rounds.
translation: 一种相当罕见且威力强大的手枪子弹，在柯尔特6250被释放后被军队和警察部队推广。可与0.40发子弹互换。

original: A rather rare and powerful pistol cartridge, popularized by military and police forces after the release of the Colt 6250. Jacketed hollow points are expensive, but theyre amazing.
translation: 一种相当罕见且威力强大的手枪子弹，在柯尔特6250被释放后被军队和警察部队推广。夹套的空心尖头很贵，但很神奇。

original: A rather rare and powerful pistol cartridge, popularized by military and police forces after the release of the Colt 6250. THese rounds are armor piercing. Though they do marginally less damage.
translation: 一种相当罕见且威力强大的手枪子弹，在柯尔特6250被释放后被军队和警察部队推广。这些子弹是穿甲的。虽然它们造成的伤害要小一些。

original: A rather rare and powerful pistol cartridge, popularized by military and police forces after the release of the Colt 6250. This specific variant is based off a chinese knock-off, reverse engineered by the Gun Runners. A good firestarter, but also makes smoke.
translation: 一种相当罕见且威力强大的手枪子弹，在柯尔特6250被释放后被军队和警察部队推广。这种特殊的变种是基于中国的仿制品，由枪支管理者逆向设计的。一个好的引火员，但也使烟雾。

original: A rather rare and powerful pistol cartridge, specialized in armor destruction.
translation: 一种相当罕见且威力强大的手枪子弹，专门用来摧毁装甲。

original: A raw mirelurk claw. Edible raw, but carries a stronger mutagen than the normal meat
translation: 一只未加工的爪子。生的可食用，但携带比正常肉更强的诱变剂

original: A reclaimed naval swivel gun, repurposed into a weapon you can carry, even if you may prefer mounting it. It has been modified with a special tube to let it hold three shots before a reload. Before the cataclysm, it was written off as little more than an antique-turned-gimmick. It has a special mechanism that lets you discharge the three shots in quick succession
translation: 一个回收的海军旋转枪，重新设计成武器，你可以携带，即使你可能更喜欢安装它。它已经用一个特殊的管子进行了修改，使它在重新装弹前能装三发子弹。在大灾变之前，它只不过是一个古董化的噱头而已。它有一个特殊的机制，可以让你快速连续发射三发子弹

original: A red mechanic's jumpsuit from a tricycle factory. Pockets abound for all your tools and spare parts.
translation: 一个三轮车厂的红色机修工的连体衣。口袋里装满了你所有的工具和备件。

original: A replica of the tommy gun used by the Silver Shroud, a popular character made by Hubris Comics. A modern retooling of the old gangster classic, you cant pin your finger on it, but it feels better.
translation: 《银裹尸布》中使用的汤米枪的复制品，一个由傲慢漫画制作的流行角色。一个旧的黑帮经典的现代改造，你不能针你的手指上，但它感觉更好。

original: A resealable glass bottle, used originally for nuka cola. It has a distinct rocket shape.
translation: 一种可重新密封的玻璃瓶，最初用于努卡可乐。它有一个独特的火箭形状。

original: A rich and tasty Mirelurk chowder, made with potatoes, veggies, and mushrooms. It tastes of hope.
translation: 一种由土豆、蔬菜和蘑菇做成的丰盛可口的米勒鲁克杂烩。它尝到了希望的味道。

original: A rifled barrel for a gun. Ideal in length for an SMG or similar compact weapon.
translation: 装枪的来复枪筒。理想的长度为SMG或类似的紧凑型武器。

original: A rifled barrel for a gun. Ideal in length for rifles.
translation: 装枪的来复枪筒。步枪的理想长度。

original: A rocket shell, with a smaller explosive, but designed to pierce armor plating.
translation: 一种火箭炮弹，带有较小的炸药，但设计用来穿透装甲板。

original: A rocket with a large explosive warhead
translation: 装有大型爆炸弹头的火箭

original: A set of football armor reinforced with copius amounts of leather, worn by the primary forces of Caesar's Legion. It has an attached leather skirt.
translation: 凯撒军团的主力部队所穿的一套用大量皮革加固的足球盔甲。它有一条附加的皮裙。

original: A set of football armor reinforced with leather and iron, worn by elite veterans of Caesar's Legion. It has an attached leather skirt.
translation: 一套用皮革和铁加固的足球盔甲，由凯撒军团的精英退伍军人穿着。它有一条附加的皮裙。

original: A set of football armor reinforced with leather, worn by fresh recruits of Caesar's Legion. It has an attached leather skirt.
translation: 凯撒军团新兵穿的一套用皮革加固的足球盔甲。它有一条附加的皮裙。

original: A shell filled with metal pellets.  Very damaging, plus the spread makes it very accurate at short range. 20 gauge shots are less powerful than 12 gauge, but make up for it with reduced recoil..
translation: 装满金属颗粒的壳。非常具有破坏性，加上传播使得它在短距离内非常精确。20口径的子弹比12口径的子弹威力小，但可以用减少的后坐力来弥补。。

original: A shotgun shell filled with tiny steel darts.  Extremely damaging, plus the spread makes it very accurate at short range.  Slices through most forms of armor with ease.
translation: 一个装满小钢镖的猎枪弹壳。极具破坏性，加上传播使得它在短距离内非常精确。轻松地穿过大多数盔甲。

original: A silver coin from a post-cataclysm civilization out west. How it got here, you don't know.
translation: 一枚来自西部大灾难后文明的银币。你不知道它是怎么来的。

original: A simple metal box, turned into a magazine.
translation: 一个简单的金属盒子，变成了一本杂志。

original: A simple white set of scientist's scrubs. They lack storage, or durability, but theyre ideal for science.
translation: 科学家的一套简单的白色擦布。它们缺乏储存能力或耐用性，但它们是科学的理想选择。

original: A small alien firearm, it seems incredibly accurate.
translation: 一个外星小武器，看起来非常精确。

original: A small bike helmet outfitted with a horned skull.
translation: 有角头骨的小型自行车头盔。

original: A small fridge.  When turned on, it will cool the food inside, extended the time until the food spoils. It is powered by an internal nuclear reactor and thus will not drain your vehicles power.
translation: 一个小冰箱。打开后，它会冷却里面的食物，延长时间，直到食物变质。它是由一个内部核反应堆提供动力，因此不会耗尽你的车辆电力。

original: A small gecko-skin backpack.  Good storage for a little encumbrance.
translation: 小壁虎皮背包。很好的存储空间，有点累赘。

original: A small golden gecko-skin backpack.  Good storage for a little encumbrance. Perfect for carrying stuff a golden gecko might be interested in, or just carrying vials of acid that youre worried about breaking.
translation: 一个金色壁虎皮的小背包。很好的存储空间，有点累赘。非常适合携带金壁虎可能感兴趣的东西，或者只携带你担心会破碎的酸瓶子。

original: A small metal box. You can think of several uses for it, including containing ammo, and small box magazines!
translation: 一个小金属盒子。你可以想到它的几种用途，包括装弹药和小盒子杂志！

original: A small pile of cast iron pellets.
A small sheet of alien metal.
A small, mutated mole rat! These little things are good eating, and can be tamed, surprisingly They get fierce when they grow up.
translation: 一只变异的小鼹鼠！这些小东西吃起来很好吃，而且可以驯服，令人惊讶的是它们长大后会变得凶猛。

original: A small, wooden action figure of president Abraham Lincoln holding a ninjatō in his right hand. There is a second sword attached to his back.
translation: 一个小的，木制的动作像，亚伯拉罕·林肯总统的右手拿着一个忍者像。他的背上还有一把剑。

original: A small, yellow model of a robotic horse. Every girl's dream toy!
translation: 机器马的黄色小模型。每个女孩的梦想玩具！

original: A small, yet bulky alien firearm, it seems incredibly powerful.
translation: 一个小，但笨重的外星武器，它似乎难以置信的强大。

original: A small, yet bulky alien firearm, it seems incredibly powerful. The shots from this one seem stronger.
translation: 一个小，但笨重的外星武器，它似乎难以置信的强大。这一枪的威力似乎更大。

original: A small, yet bulky alien firearm, it seems incredibly powerful. The shots from this one seem to split and disperse.
translation: 一个小，但笨重的外星武器，它似乎难以置信的强大。这一次的枪声似乎四分五裂。

original: A small, yet powerful nuka powered engine.
translation: 一个小而强大的努卡动力发动机。

original: A smallish patch of golden leather, could be used to make tough, yet beautiful clothing.
translation: 一小块金黄色的皮革，可以用来做坚韧而漂亮的衣服。

original: A smallish patch of silvery leather, that could be used to make tough clothing.
translation: 一小块银色皮革，可以用来做坚韧的衣服。

original: A soft, red cotton hat. Worn by the NCR's 1st Recon division; 'The last things you'll never see'.
translation: 一顶柔软的红色棉帽。NCR第一侦察师穿的“你永远看不到的最后的东西”。

original: A solid black magazine chambered in 14mm.
translation: 一个坚固的黑色杂志室在14毫米。

original: A solid black magazine chambered in 14mm. It has rear sights on it.
translation: 一个坚固的黑色杂志室在14毫米。它有后方瞄准镜。

original: A solid black magazine made just for the Colt 6250.
A somewhat primative martial art, Gecko Hunting was developed in Klamath to avoid a gecko's deadly bite and get them
translation: 有点灵长类武术，壁虎狩猎是在克拉马斯发展，以避免壁虎的致命咬伤，并得到他们

original: A stout wooden pole with whats essentially a serrated knife on it. It appears to have been made with care.
translation: 一种粗壮的木杆，上面有一把锯齿刀。它似乎是精心制作的。

original: A stout wooden pole with whats essentially a serrated knife on it. This one feels cheap and flimsy.
translation: 一种粗壮的木杆，上面有一把锯齿刀。这件感觉既便宜又脆弱。

original: A strange chunk of meat with... Glue in it. Weird.
translation: 一块奇怪的肉。。。粘在里面。奇怪的。

original: A strange device, constructed from an odd technology...
translation: 一个奇怪的装置，用一种奇怪的技术。。。

original: A style honed by the Hero of Arroyo, Arroyo Style combines the dirty tactics of New Reno Boxing, the Honor of Dragon-Style Kung Fu, and the fluidity of a wastelander's wit into a single style.
translation: 阿罗约风格是由阿罗约的英雄磨练而成的，它将新雷诺拳击的肮脏战术、龙式功夫的荣耀以及荒原人机智的流动性结合成一个单一的风格。

original: A suit of T-45D power armor, T-51's weaker cousin, T-45 is bulky, but still effective.
translation: 一套T-45D动力装甲，T-51较弱的表亲，T-45笨重，但仍然有效。

original: A suit of T-45D power armor, T-51's weaker cousin, T-45 is bulky, but still effective. It requires power.  It is turned on and continually drawing power.  Use it to turn it off.
translation: 一套T-45D动力装甲，T-51较弱的表亲，T-45笨重，但仍然有效。它需要力量。它被打开并不断地吸取能量。用它来关掉它。

original: A suit of brown body armor used by NCR troopers and rangers. Provides great environmental protection
translation: NCR士兵和游骑兵使用的一套棕色防弹衣。提供良好的环境保护

original: A suit of full body green armor used by army personell shortly before the cataclysm. Its covered in pockets and pouches.
translation: 大灾变前不久军队人员使用的一套全身绿色盔甲。包在口袋里。

original: A suit of full body white armor used by army personell shortly before the cataclysm. Its much warmer than similar armors, though not as protective. It has a large red cross on the back, to signify you're not an active combatant. Sadly, zombies don't recognize the Geneva Convention.
translation: 大灾变前不久军队人员使用的一套全身白色盔甲。它比类似的盔甲温暖得多，虽然没有防护作用。它的背面有一个大的红十字，表示你不是一个活跃的战士。可悲的是，僵尸不承认日内瓦公约。

original: A suit of full body white armor used by army personell shortly before the cataclysm. Its much warmer than similar armors.
translation: 大灾变前不久军队人员使用的一套全身白色盔甲。它比类似的盔甲暖和得多。

original: A suit of handcrafted heavy-steel armor from out west, worn by only the greatest warriors. Well, no traditionalists are here to stop you now.
translation: 一套来自西部的手工制作的重钢盔甲，只有最伟大的战士才穿。好吧，现在没有传统主义者来阻止你了。

original: A suit of handmade metal armor. The arms have spiked pauldrons
translation: 一套手工制作的金属盔甲。手臂上有刺

original: A super-concentrated, glowing, viscous mutagen.  You need a syringe to inject it… if you really want to?
translation: 一种超浓缩、发光、粘稠的诱变剂。你需要注射器注射…如果你真的想？

original: A super-hero comic from Mexico. Its all in spanish...
translation: 来自墨西哥的超级英雄漫画。全是西班牙语。。。

original: A super-hero comic, based around the exploits of the team known as The Unstoppables. The hero team includes The Silver Shroud, Manta-Man, and of course, Grognak himself.
translation: 一个超级英雄漫画，周围的团队称为不可阻挡的功绩为基础。英雄团队包括银裹尸布、螳螂，当然还有格罗纳克本人。

original: A tan button-down shirt with long sleeves, and an NCR patch on the front.  Looks professional!
translation: 一件长袖黄褐色纽扣衬衫，前面有NCR补丁。看起来很专业！

original: A thick dark blue duster, once worn by the general of the Commonwealth Minutemen. It's yours now, general.
translation: 一种厚厚的深蓝色掸子，曾被英联邦民兵的将军戴过。现在是你的了，将军。

original: A thick gecko-skin full-length duster.  Has many pockets for storage.
translation: 厚厚的壁虎皮全长除尘器。有许多口袋可供存放。

original: A thick golden gecko-skin full-length duster.  Has many pockets for storage. It also doubles as a raincoat!
translation: 厚厚的金色壁虎皮全长掸子。有许多口袋可供存放。它还兼作雨衣！

original: A thick leather trenchcoat, lined with pockets.  If someone wearing this approaches you, run.
translation: 一件有口袋的厚皮战壕大衣。如果有人穿这个走近你，快跑。

original: A thick leather trenchcoat, lined with pockets.  It seems to just demand respect.
translation: 一件有口袋的厚皮战壕大衣。似乎只是需要尊重。

original: A thick, red longcoat.  Has many pockets for storage.
translation: 一件厚厚的红色长外套。有许多口袋可供存放。

original: A thin cotton jacket made to represent a college football team.
translation: 一种用来代表大学足球队的薄棉袄。

original: A thin pair of golden gecko-skin gloves. Ever wanted to choke out a spitter? with these babies, you can.
translation: 一双薄薄的金壁虎皮手套。你有没有想过要掐死吐口水的人？有了这些孩子，你可以。

original: A thin pair of silver gecko-skin gloves.
translation: 一双薄薄的银色壁虎皮手套。

original: A thin sheet of flexible alien metal.
translation: 一种柔性的外来金属薄片。

original: A thin, blue jumpsuit, with a few pockets, with a yellow zipper down the front  Provides decent storage and is not very encumbering. It's customizable for the Vault Dweller with priorities, and has a belt with pouches on it to make up for it's lack of pockets.
translation: 一件单薄的蓝色连体衣，有几个口袋，前面有一条黄色拉链，提供了不错的储物空间，也不太碍事。它是为有优先权的金库居住者定制的，并且有一个带口袋的腰带来弥补口袋的不足。

original: A thin, blue jumpsuit, with a few pockets, with a yellow zipper down the front  Provides decent storage and is not very encumbering. It's customizable for the Vault Dweller with priorities, and has a belt with pouches on it to make up for it's lack of pockets. It's lightly armored, has more pouches, and has a bright yellow 13 on it's back.
translation: 一件单薄的蓝色连体衣，有几个口袋，前面有一条黄色拉链，提供了不错的储物空间，也不太碍事。它是为有优先权的金库居住者定制的，并且有一个带口袋的腰带来弥补口袋的不足。它的装甲很轻，有更多的袋子，背上有一个亮黄色的13。

original: A thin, blue jumpsuit, with a few pockets, with a yellow zipper down the front  Provides decent storage and is not very encumbering. It's customizable for the Vault Dweller with priorities, and has a belt with pouches on it to make up for it's lack of pockets. This one has the number 13 on the back in yellow, and has been customized with more storage.
translation: 一件单薄的蓝色连体衣，有几个口袋，前面有一条黄色拉链，提供了不错的储物空间，也不太碍事。它是为有优先权的金库居住者定制的，并且有一个带口袋的腰带来弥补口袋的不足。这一个有数字13在后面的黄色，并已定制了更多的存储。

original: A thin, blue jumpsuit, with a few pockets, with a yellow zipper down the front  Provides decent storage and is not very encumbering. It's customizable for the Vault Dweller with priorities, and has a belt with pouches on it to make up for it's lack of pockets. This one has the number 13 on the back in yellow.
translation: 一件单薄的蓝色连体衣，有几个口袋，前面有一条黄色拉链，提供了不错的储物空间，也不太碍事。它是为有优先权的金库居住者定制的，并且有一个带口袋的腰带来弥补口袋的不足。这张背面的13号是黄色的。

original: A thin, short-sleeved jumpsuit updated for the trans-human who needs full-body clothing.  Provides some storage and is adjustable to minimize encumbrance.
translation: 一种薄短袖连衣裙，为需要穿全身衣服的人提供更新。提供一些存储空间，并可调整以最大限度地减少负担。

original: A throwback to water-cooled machine guns of old, the Derringer RF2076 is a side-loading light machine gun. Its incredibly bulky, meant to be used in power armor. It can, however, be wielded without power armor.
translation: 一个回溯到老式水冷机枪，德林格RF2076是一个侧面装载轻机枪。它非常笨重，用来做动力装甲。但是，它可以在没有能量护甲的情况下使用。

original: A tiny battery of sorts, full of alien plasma.
translation: 一个小小的电池，充满了外星人的等离子。

original: A top-loading 10mm magazine with sights on it.
translation: 装有瞄准镜的顶装10毫米的杂志。

original: A tough hooded jacket with lots of pockets, thickly padded for warmth.  Favored by the eastern branch of the Enclave.
translation: 一件结实的有兜帽的夹克，有很多口袋，厚垫保暖。受到飞地东部分支的青睐。

original: A tough pair of pants lined with pockets, thickly padded for warmth.  Favored by the eastern branch of the Enclave.
translation: 一条结实的裤子，内衬口袋，加厚衬垫保暖。受到飞地东部分支的青睐。

original: A toy rocket ship full of glowing fluid. Some kids went to the hospital for drinking it, before the cataclysm. Remembering this gives you a sick chuckle. Kids these days.
translation: 装满发光液体的玩具火箭船。灾难发生前，一些孩子去医院喝了它。记住这一点会让你恶心地笑。现在的孩子们。

original: A varmint rifle that appears to have been customized by an exterminator to stealthily hunt vermin. It has a black finish, with a rat skull engraved upon it
translation: 一种瓦明特步枪，似乎是由一个灭虫者定制的，用来偷猎害虫。它的表面是黑色的，上面刻着老鼠的头骨

original: A very powerful healing magic- though it will bring the feeling of sleep to your head.
translation: 一个非常强大的治疗魔法-虽然它会带来睡眠的感觉到你的头。

original: A very small fridge for keeping food cool.  Provides some insulation from outside weather. Powered by an internal reactor, it doesnt need to be connected to vehicle power to work.
translation: 用来冷藏食物的小冰箱。提供一些外部天气绝缘。由内部反应堆提供动力，无需连接车辆电源即可工作。

original: A very strong liquor or cleaning fluid, you decide.
translation: 一种很浓的酒或清洗液，你说了算。

original: A warm ushanka with a disgusting red star on the front.
translation: 一只温暖的乌山卡，前面有一颗恶心的红星。

original: A warm, white covering that protects the head and face from the cold. It's reinforced with Kevlar to protect your face.
translation: 一种温暖的白色覆盖物，保护头部和面部免受寒冷。它用芳纶加固以保护你的脸。

original: A weird alien thruster which allows amphibious transportation. Sadly it doesn't allow flight. It seems too broken.
translation: 一个奇怪的外星推进器，可以进行两栖运输。可惜它不允许飞行。它看起来太破了。

original: A weird hover-thruster from a UFO wreck. You might be able to strap this to a vehicle to let it hover.
translation: 不明飞行物残骸上奇怪的悬停推进器。你也许可以把它绑在一辆车上让它盘旋。

original: A weird looking green fruit with remarkable health benefits.
translation: 一种外观奇特的绿色水果，对健康有显著的好处。

original: A wooden stock to a rifle or shotgun. Provides decent enough .
translation: 步枪或猎枪的木制枪托。提供足够的体面。

original: A worthless Nuka-Cola bottlecap. You've heard that in some places they are used as money, though you suspect its only a story.
translation: 一文不值的努卡可乐瓶盖。你听说过在一些地方它们被用作金钱，尽管你怀疑这只是一个故事。

original: A young, mutated chameleon. It can't disguise itself anymore, but that doesnt matter with how dangerous it is.
translation: 一种年轻的变异变色龙。它不能再伪装自己了，但这与它有多危险无关。

original: A young, mutated chameleon. It can't disguise itself anymore, but that doesnt matter with how dangerous it is. It glows in the dark, and is toxic.
translation: 一种年轻的变异变色龙。它不能再伪装自己了，但这与它有多危险无关。它在黑暗中发光，有毒。

original: A young, mutated chameleon. It can't disguise itself anymore, but that doesnt matter with how dangerous it is. It is albino, yet somehow, more durable due to such.
translation: 一种年轻的变异变色龙。它不能再伪装自己了，但这与它有多危险无关。它是白化病，但不知何故，更持久，由于这样的。

original: A young, mutated gecko. It leaves behind a trail of acidic drool.
translation: 一只年轻的变异壁虎。它会留下一道酸性的口水。
令人惊奇的是，仍然可以食用。

original: An AK-112 5mm Assault Rifle. An old military model, out of use around the time of the cataclysm. Can fire single-shot or burst, using the high velocity 5mm rounds.
translation: AK-1125mm突击步枪。一个旧的军用模型，在大灾难发生的时候就不用了。使用高速5毫米子弹，可以发射单发或爆炸。

original: An American-180, redesigned and modified by the Gun Runners. The barrel has an internal silencer.
translation: 一架美国-180，由跑枪者重新设计和改装。枪管有一个内部消音器。

original: An Enclave Power Helmet, with the eyes glowing menacingly.
translation: 飞地能量头盔，眼睛发出威胁的光芒。

original: An H&K L30 Gatling Laser. Designed specifically for military use, these were in the prototype stage at the beginning of the Cataclysm. Multiple barrels allow longer firing before overheating. Powered by Micro Fusion Cells, or a UPS.
translation: H&kl30转管激光器。专为军事用途而设计，这些都是在大灾变之初的原型阶段。多个枪管允许在过热前进行更长时间的射击。由微融合细胞或UPS供电。

original: An Incendiary 5mm round, for when you just want to set the world on fire.
translation: 一个5毫米的燃烧弹，当你只想放火的时候。

original: An SMG calibered in 14mm, based off the build of an old TDI vector, and enhanced by the Gun Runners.
translation: 一个14毫米口径的SMG，建立在一个旧的TDI载体的基础上，并通过枪的运行来增强。

original: An abomination of a pistol originally meant to defend in pirate attacks, this baby has four barrels, each aiming in different directions, none forwards. It carries four shots, all fired at once. Say goodbye to your wrists.
translation: 这把手枪原本是用来防御海盗袭击的，它是一把令人憎恶的手枪，它有四个枪管，每个枪管瞄准不同的方向，没有一个朝前。它有四发子弹，一次发射。跟你的手腕说再见。

original: An ancient half-baked weapon, a musket with a shield through it. Its really hard to aim. You can use it to block attacks though
translation: 一种古老的半生不熟的武器，有盾牌的步枪。很难瞄准。你可以用它来阻止攻击

original: An ancient shotgun type, banned in many countries and states! The .50 caliber of the shotgun world.
translation: 一种古老的猎枪类型，在许多国家和州被禁止！0.50口径的猎枪世界。

original: An empty casing from a 10mm round.
An empty casing from a 14mm round.
An empty casing from a 25mm gremade.
translation: 一个25毫米口径的灰色玻璃制成的空外壳。

original: An empty casing from a 45.70 round.
An empty casing from a 5mm round.
An empty casing from a cannon shot.
An empty hull from a 2 gauge shell.
An empty hull from a 20 gauge shotgun shell.
translation: 一个20口径霰弹枪的空壳。

original: An enclave officer's hat. Black, with the enclave logo above the brim.
translation: 飞地军官的帽子。黑色，边缘上方带有enclave标志。

original: An enclave power armor helmet. The eyes can have a menacing glow to them. The eye-glow is powered by conventional batteries.
translation: 飞地能量盔甲。眼睛会发出威胁的光芒。这种眼睛发光由传统电池供电。

original: An engine powered by Nuka Cola. How strange.
translation: 一种由努卡可乐提供动力的发动机。真奇怪。

original: An enormous green ant covered in chitinous plates.  It possesses a pair of wriggling antennae and vicious-looking mandibles. It seems to emit fungicide.
translation: 一种巨大的绿色蚂蚁，上面覆盖着几丁质的盘子。它有一对蠕动的触角和凶恶的下颚。它似乎散发出杀菌剂。

original: An essential book on driving, while also giving some deep insight on Zen philosophy. Reading this should help you keep your cool while driving.
translation: 一本关于驾驶的重要书籍，同时也对禅宗哲学有一些深刻的见解。阅读这篇文章可以帮助你在开车时保持冷静。

original: An exciting bi-yearly magazine about boxing exploits. There's also small sections about wrestling, kickboxing, and MMA.
translation: 一本关于拳击功绩的激动人心的两年期杂志。还有关于摔跤、跆拳道和MMA的小部分。

original: An experimental pre-cataclsym weapon, firing grenades with speeds nearly unheard of. Incredibly dangerous.
translation: 一种实验性的战前武器，以几乎闻所未闻的速度发射手榴弹。非常危险。

original: An eyebot programmed to play a radio station from really far out west. It has a lot of country-ish songs, and songs you'd hear in the city of sin. The radio host has a charisma you just can't resist.
translation: 从遥远的西部播放广播的眼点。它有很多乡村歌曲，你会在罪恶之城听到的歌曲。电台主持人有一种你无法抗拒的魅力。

original: An eyebot tuned to a radio station out of the ruins of DC. Is that Three Dog from GNR? No... He sounds too depressed...
translation: 从华盛顿废墟中调到电台的眼点。那是GNR的三条狗吗？不。。。他听起来太沮丧了。。。

original: An eyebot tuned to a radio station out of the ruins of DC. The station has a bombastic host who fills you with energy.
translation: 从华盛顿废墟中调到电台的眼点。电视台有一位夸夸其谈的主持人，他让你充满活力。

original: An image of a singer. Obviously, very old. The image has a felt coating that is still in good condition
translation: 歌手的形象。显然，很老了。图像有一层仍完好无损的毛毡涂层

original: An incredibly potent plasma used in alien laser weaponry.
translation: 一种用于外星激光武器的极其强大的等离子体。

original: An old 20 gauge shotgun, possibly antique.  It is little more than a barrel, a wood stock, and a hammer to strike the cartridge.  Its simple design keeps it both light and accurate.
translation: 一把20口径的旧猎枪，可能是古董。它只不过是一个木桶、一个木料和一把锤子来敲击弹壳。它简单的设计使它既轻又准。

original: An old pulp magazine about police exploits. The highly editorialized stories in this issue include 'Shoot to Kill' by Alan Kastin, 'Shootout with a Chem-Crazy Dame', and 'Eight Bullets, Ten crooks'. This magazine hasn't been printed since the early 2000s due to sensitive subject matter, and moral guardians. You're holding a piece of pop culture history.
translation: 一本关于警察功绩的低俗杂志。本期高度社论化的报道包括艾伦·卡斯汀的《射杀》，《与一个化学狂女人的枪战》和《八发子弹，十个骗子》。由于敏感的主题和道德守护者，这本杂志从21世纪初就没有出版过。你手里拿着一段流行文化史。

original: An over-under shotgun, popular among sport shooters, caravan companies, and even hunters. It uses the weaker 20ga shot, allowing the shooter greater control
translation: 一种在运动射击运动员、商队公司甚至猎人中流行的超低档猎枪。它使用较弱的20ga射击，让射手有更大的控制力

original: An over-under shotgun, popular among sport shooters, caravan companies, and even hunters. It uses the weaker 20ga shot, allowing the shooter greater control. This particular beauty seems to have been painstakingly refurbished.
translation: 一种在运动射击运动员、商队公司甚至猎人中流行的超低档猎枪。它使用较弱的20ga射击，让射手有更大的控制力。这种独特的美似乎经过了精心的翻新。

original: As a kid, you were a fan of the Grognak the Barbarian comics, and specifically their villain, the AntAgonizer. In the chaos of the Cataclysm, you managed to save your ant farm, costume, and favorite comic.
translation: 当你还是个孩子的时候，你是格罗纳克野蛮漫画的粉丝，尤其是他们的恶棍，敌对者。在大灾变的混乱中，你设法拯救了你的蚂蚁农场、服装和最喜欢的漫画。

original: Baed off the PGM Hecate II, this baby is one of the heaviest hitters, and best sellers, in the Gun Runners' Arsenal.
translation: 在PGM Hecate II的轰击下，这个小家伙是最重的击球手之一，也是最畅销的，在跑枪的兵工厂里。

original: Before the cataclysm, you spent your life with the coolest cats around; the atom cats. You know your way around atomic vehicles, and even the occasional set of power armor.
translation: 在大灾变之前，你和周围最酷的猫一起度过了一生；原子猫。你知道如何绕过原子弹载具，甚至是偶尔的一套动力装甲。

original: Before the cataclysm, you were an avid antkeeper, and kept a very dangerous breed. So dangerous, you had to wear protective gear in the ant room. You found a mysterious, large egg in there shortly before the cataclysm. Lets hope it can save you now.
translation: 在大灾变之前，你是一个狂热的养蚁人，养着一个非常危险的品种。太危险了，你必须在蚂蚁房里穿上防护装备。你在大灾难前发现了一个神秘的大鸡蛋。希望它现在能救你。

original: Before the cataclysm, you were trying to make a breed of ants that could resist the cordyceps fungus. You had just succeeded when your undead co-worker spilled something on your ant tray.
translation: 在大灾变之前，你试图培育出一种能抵抗虫草真菌的蚂蚁。你刚刚成功，你的不死族同事把东西洒在你的蚂蚁托盘上。

original: Brings a little bit of that retro-futuristic class to the Cataclysm. Guns, beasts, and more. Stuff from the Core Region, all the way to the Commonwealth.
translation: 给《大灾变》带来了一点复古的未来派风格。枪、野兽等等。从核心地区一直到联邦的东西。

original: Compact version of a chest freezer, designed as a mobile solution for freezing food.  Provides insulation from the elements. Doesnt require power on account of its own internal power.
translation: 柜式冷冻机的紧凑型，设计用于冷冻食物的移动解决方案。提供与元件的绝缘。因为自身的内力，不需要权力。

original: Cooked Blamco Mac N' Cheese. Delicious.
translation: 煮熟的布朗科奶酪。好吃。

original: Cooked Blamco Mac N' Cheese. Delicious. Now with added Cram, and cave fungus!
translation: 煮熟的布朗科奶酪。好吃。现在加上补习班和洞穴真菌！

original: Cooked Blamco Mac N' Cheese. Delicious. Now with added Cram, for protein.
translation: 煮熟的布朗科奶酪。好吃。现在添加了Cram，用于蛋白质。

original: Dehydrated gecko flakes.  With proper storage, this dried food will remain edible for an incredibly long time.
translation: 脱水壁虎片。经过适当的储存，这种干食品将在难以置信的长时间内保持可食用。

original: Delicious, cooked instamash. . It would be better with some extra ingredients.
translation: 美味的，煮熟的土豆泥。多加些配料会更好。

original: Delicious, cooked instamash. Enhanced with bits of dried cram!
translation: 美味的，煮熟的。加上一点干面包！

original: Delicious, cooked instamash. Enhanced with bits of dried cram, cheese, and even mushrooms!
translation: 美味的，煮熟的。添加少量干面包、奶酪，甚至蘑菇！

original: Delicious, fresh Mirelurk. Cut up and drained so the mutagen is ultimately reduced to a harmless amount.
translation: 美味，新鲜的米勒鲁克。切碎并排空，使诱变剂最终减少到无害的量。

original: Delicious, fresh Mirelurk. Edible raw, but better cooked. Has trace amounts of mutagen, may not be the best to eat it raw.
translation: 美味，新鲜的米勒鲁克。生的可以吃，但煮得更好。有微量诱变剂，可能不是生吃最好的。

original: Dried Gecko meat, put onto a stick with veggies and further seasoned. Not incredibly healthy, but it does have veggies in it, and it's pretty filling.
translation: 干壁虎肉，放在一根棍子上与蔬菜和进一步调味。不是很健康，但是里面有蔬菜，而且很饱。

original: Everything you need to know about robots, turrets, and even computers. The writings pretty dry, though.
translation: 你需要知道的关于机器人，炮塔，甚至计算机的一切。不过，这些文字相当枯燥。

original: Freshly butchered gecko meat.  You could eat it raw, but you'll regret it.
translation: 刚屠宰的壁虎肉。你可以生吃，但你会后悔的。

original: Freshly cooked mirelurk meat.  Very nutritious, and the mutagen was cooked out. It wont last as long though
translation: 刚煮好的米勒鲁克肉。很有营养，而且诱变剂是煮出来的。但不会持续那么久

original: Glowing cave fungus. It soaks up radiation, and tastes good to boot
translation: 发光的洞穴真菌。它能吸收辐射，而且味道很好

original: Grognak the Barbarian and the Jungle of the Bat Babies. Violent, brutal, and... utterly fun.
translation: 格罗纳克的野蛮人和蝙蝠宝宝的丛林。暴力，残忍，还有。。。非常有趣。

original: Gun Runners' Heavy Duty Cargo Truck
translation: 枪支走私者的重型货车

original: H&K MP9 submachinegun (10mm variant). A medium-sized SMG, capable of single shot and burst mode.
translation: H&K MP9冲锋枪（10毫米变型）。一种中等尺寸的SMG，能够单次发射和突发模式。
手工制作。45口径微型手枪

original: Healing Powder mixed into a sweet drink. It tastes better, is better for you, and helps you sleep. It's a miracle drug. Just don't use it in combat.
translation: 混合在甜饮料中的疗伤粉。它味道更好，对你更好，而且有助于你睡眠。这是一种神奇的药物。只是不要在战斗中使用它。

original: Hell's Chain Gang, by Hubris Comics. Full of improvised weapons based off those real POWs used to escape Chinese POW camps.
translation: 地狱锁链帮，由傲慢漫画。全是根据那些真正的战俘用来逃离中国战俘营的简易武器。

original: Hey kids, do you want some 200 year old salisbury steak, or do you want some news? News it is.
translation: 嘿，孩子们，你们想要一些200年前的索尔兹伯里牛排，还是想要一些新闻？是新闻。

original: If you see this off a gun, it's a bug. :P Its what allows .22 pistols and SMGs to be naturally silent.
translation: 如果你从枪上看到这个，那就是虫子。：P它允许.22手枪和SMG自然静音。

original: Impress your friends and colleagues with this easy how-to guide to traps and antipersonnel devices. Great Fun!
translation: 用这个简单的陷阱和杀伤装置操作指南给你的朋友和同事留下深刻印象。太有趣了！

original: Instant mashed potatoes. Disgusting raw, but they make a good comfort food cooked.
translation: 速溶土豆泥。生的令人作呕，但煮熟后却成了很好的安慰食品。

original: It could be eaten raw if you're desperate, but is much better cooked. Sterilized with radiation to last upwards of 200 years
translation: 如果你绝望的话，它可以生吃，但是煮得更好。经过辐射灭菌，寿命可达200年以上

original: Jerky made from an iguana. Bob's specialty! Goes great with Nuka-Cola. (Note: Not made from actual Iguana)
translation: 鬣蜥做的肉干。鲍勃的专长！和Nuka可乐搭配很好。（注：并非由实际鬣蜥制成）

original: Just thinking of mutagen (such a lovely word!  'Mutagen'.  Perfect!) makes you thirsty.  And you so love your new parts.  You simply must have more mutagen!
translation: 想想诱变剂（多么可爱的词啊！）诱变剂。太好了！）让你口渴。你很喜欢你的新角色。你必须有更多的诱变剂！

original:
Landing a hit fills you with enough fury you could rip someone's ear off.

 Extra x2.5 damage on follow up hits.
Lasts 2 turns.
translation:
击中目标会让你充满足够的愤怒，你可以撕掉别人的耳朵。

额外的x2.5伤害的后续命中。
持续2圈。

original: Long, flowing robes.  They are purple, with golden detailings. Just wearing them makes you feel safe. Like some diety is watching over you, influencing every action into your favor... Yet you still feel uneasy.
translation: 飘逸的长袍。它们是紫色的，有金色的细节。穿上它们会让你感到安全。就像一些节食者在看着你，影响着你的一举一动。。。但你仍然感到不安。

original: Named due to it's resemblance to a pig, this rodent is somewhat aggressive in it's piglike hunger.
translation: 这种啮齿类动物因其与猪相似而得名，它的饥饿感有点像猪。

original: Nuka-Cola Quantum. This stuff was just released before the Cataclysm, and is said to be very energizing. Side effects may include blue urine, mild radioactive glow, and addiction.
translation: Nuka Cola Quantum公司。这些东西在大灾变前刚刚发布，据说非常有活力。副作用可能包括蓝尿、轻度放射性发光和成瘾。

original: Nuka-Cola, the drink of choice for the wastelander on the go. This is the good stuff, complete with passion fruit!
translation: 努卡可乐，是荒原人的首选饮料。这是好东西，配西番莲果！

original: Nuka-Cola, the drink of choice for the wastelander on the go. This stuff is gross, on account of a recipe change during the great Passion Fruit famine. It's just watered down.
translation: 努卡可乐，是荒原人的首选饮料。这东西很恶心，因为在西番莲大饥荒期间食谱发生了变化。只是淡化了。

original: One of the enclave's myriad of power armor models, the X-01 is the first model, used by the Enclave elite
translation: 作为enclave众多的动力装甲型号之一，X-01是enclave精英使用的第一款型号

original: One of the enclave's myriad of power armor models, the X-01 is the first model, used by the Enclave elite.  It requires power.  It is turned on and continually drawing power.  Use it to turn it off.
translation: 作为enclave无数的动力装甲模型之一，X-01是enclave精英使用的第一个模型。它需要力量。它被打开并不断地吸取能量。用它来关掉它。

original: Popular among children.  It's fairly accurate, but BBs deal nearly no damage. The Red Ryder itself performs better than most of it's kind.
translation: 很受孩子们的欢迎。这是相当准确的，但BBs几乎没有造成损害。红莱德本身的表现比大多数同类都好。

original: Popular among children.  It's fairly accurate, but BBs deal nearly no damage. The Red Ryder itself performs better than most of it's kind. This specialty model comes with a compass on the stock, and has several more spots for modification.
translation: 很受孩子们的欢迎。这是相当准确的，但BBs几乎没有造成损害。红莱德本身的表现比大多数同类都好。这种特殊型号的股票上有一个指南针，并有多个修改点。

original: Premium cuts of iguana jerky, seasoned and mixed with some preserved veggies. Something seems off about it... but it tastes really good!. (Note: Not made from actual Iguana)
translation: 优质鬣蜥肉干，调味后与一些腌制蔬菜混合。好像有点不对劲。。。但味道真的很好！。（注：并非由实际鬣蜥制成）

original: Premium cuts of iguana jerky, seasoned mixed with some preserved veggies. It tastes really good!. (Note: Not made from actual Iguana)
translation: 优质鬣蜥肉干，用腌制蔬菜调味。味道真不错！。（注：并非由实际鬣蜥制成）

original: Primer for a tank or artillery shell.
Processed and irradiated devilled eggs. Theyre good, though!
translation: 经过加工和辐照的脱蛋。不过他们很好！

original: Reconstituted gecko flakes, which are much more enjoyable to eat now that they have been rehydrated.
translation: 重组壁虎片，这是更愉快的吃现在他们已经补充水分。

original: Rockwell designed the Avenger as the replacement for their aging CZ53 Personal Minigun. The Avenger's design improvements include improved, gel-fin, cooling and chromium plated barrel-bores. This gives it a greater range and lethality. It rotates super fast, so it needs power to fire.
translation: 罗克韦尔设计了复仇者作为他们老化的CZ53个人微型枪的替代品。复仇者的设计改进包括改进，凝胶翅，冷却和镀铬桶孔。这使得它的射程和杀伤力更大。它的旋转速度非常快，所以需要能量来发射。

original: Salad with all kind of fruit within it.
translation: 里面有各种水果的沙拉。

original: Scrap parts of an oddly flexable red metal.
translation: 一种奇怪的易弯曲的红色金属的碎片。

original: Specially prepared mirelurk meat. It unfortunately retains the mutagenic property, but it will last forever, in theory.
translation: 特别准备的米勒鲁克肉。不幸的是，它保留了诱变特性，但从理论上讲，它将永远存在。

original: Standard 8-round box magazine for a Gun Runners' AMR-50 anti-materiel rifle.
translation: 标准的8圆盒弹匣，用于枪械运动员的AMR-50反装备步枪。

original: Sugar Bombs: 100 percent daily value of... sugar.
Tales of a Junktown Jerky Vendor
translation: 关于一个垃圾镇肉干小贩的故事

original: Tales of a Klamath Gecko Hunter
translation: 克拉马斯壁虎猎人的故事

original: Tasty gecko meat that has been heavily smoked for preservation.  It could be further smoked to dehydrate it completely.
translation: 美味的壁虎肉，经过大量熏制以保存。可以进一步熏制，使其完全脱水。

original: The AEP7 laser pistol was put into service to replace the aging Wattz 1000 model. With a generous battery size, tight shot grouping at range, resilience to extended use, and fairly decent damage output, it is a very good choice for a sidearm.
translation: AEP7激光手枪投入使用，以取代老化的Wattz 1000型号。它拥有宽大的电池尺寸，射程密集，对扩展使用的弹性，以及相当不错的伤害输出，是一个非常好的选择。

original: The AEP7 laser pistol was put into service to replace the aging Wattz 1000 model. With a generous battery size, tight shot grouping at range, resilience to extended use, and fairly decent damage output, it is a very good choice for a sidearm. This one was customized with the logo of Sunset Sasparilla, and fires 5 shots at once, kind of like a shotgun. The beam has a distinct red color.
translation: AEP7激光手枪投入使用，以取代老化的Wattz 1000型号。它拥有宽大的电池尺寸，射程密集，对扩展使用的弹性，以及相当不错的伤害输出，是一个非常好的选择。这一个是定制的标志日落萨斯帕里拉，并开火5枪一次，有点像散弹枪。光束有明显的红色。

original: The AntAgonizer, an antihero comic from Hubris Comics. The authors worked tirelessly to keep designs as realistically as possible.
translation: 《敌对者》，自大漫画中的反英雄漫画。作者孜孜不倦地努力使设计尽可能逼真。

original: The Boy Scout's handbook, 2077 edition. Contains information useful in wilderness survival, including a few melee weapons, and the 'Survival Quesidilla'!
translation: 童子军手册，2077年版。包含在荒野生存有用的信息，包括一些近战武器，和'生存奎西迪拉'！

original: The DKS-501 Sniper Rifle. A popular weapon among mercenaries, SWAT, and even the military. It has a distinctive black-and-yellow paintjob.
translation: DKS-501狙击步枪。在雇佣兵，特警，甚至军队中很流行的武器。它有一个独特的黑色和黄色油漆工作。
