original: The Enclave sent your squad out to survey what was left of New England, and retrieve important military documents. They got absolutely slaughtered, and you're all thats left. Supplies have run low, backup isn't set to come for months, if at all. Long live the enclave.
translation: 飞地派你的小队去调查新英格兰剩下的东西，找回重要的军事文件。他们被屠杀了，剩下的只有你。物资供应不足，如果有的话，几个月内都不会有备份。飞地万岁。

original: The German Rheinmetall AG company created the ultimate minigun. The Vindicator throws over 90,000 caseless shells per minute down its six carbon-polymer barrels. As the pinnacle of Teutonic engineering skill, it is the ultimate hand-held weapon.
translation: 德国莱茵金属股份公司创造了终极微型枪。维权者每分钟向其6个碳聚合物桶投掷9万多枚无壳炮弹。作为日耳曼工程技术的巅峰，它是终极的手持式武器。

original: The Gun Runners AC-5 is a sister to their MC-223, being a carbine made for use by paratroopers. While the MC-223 is focused on precision shots, the AC-5 is focused on pure fire rate.
translation: 跑枪的AC-5是他们的MC-223的姐妹，是一种供伞兵使用的卡宾枪。虽然MC-223的重点是精确射击，AC-5的重点是纯火力。

original: The Heckler & Koch P90c was just coming into use at the time of the war. The weapon's bullpup layout, and compact design, make it easy to control. The durable P90c is prized for its reliability, and high firepower in a ruggedly-compact package.
translation: 哈克勒和科赫P90c刚刚投入使用时的战争。该武器的bullpup布局，紧凑的设计，使其易于控制。耐用的P90c以其可靠性和坚固紧凑的封装中的高火力而备受推崇。

original: The Stent Security Solutions R91. This baby was used all throughout Anchorage, as well as by the national guard, before the cataclysm. It has a classic wooden stock.
translation: 支架安全解决方案R91。这个婴儿在整个安克雷奇，以及国民警卫队，在大灾难之前都被使用过。它有一个经典的木制股票。

original: The T-51b powered infantry armor is designed with the latest passive defense features for both civilian and military disturbances. It requires power.
translation: 以T-51b为动力的步兵装甲设计了最新的被动防御功能，以应对民用和军事干扰。它需要力量。

original: The T-51b powered infantry armor is designed with the latest passive defense features for both civilian and military disturbances. It requires power.  It is turned on and continually drawing power.  Use it to turn it off.
translation: 以T-51b为动力的步兵装甲设计了最新的被动防御功能，以应对民用和军事干扰。它需要力量。它被打开并不断地吸取能量。用它来关掉它。

original: The Wasteland Survival Guide, by Moira Brown. While seemingly written by a lunatic before the cataclysm, surprisingly, a lot of things in this book are accurate to today's predicament. Its also full of great hand-drawn diagrams, so even a mole rat could understand whats happening in it!
translation: 荒地生存指南，作者：莫伊拉布朗。虽然看似是一个疯子在大灾变前写的，但令人惊讶的是，这本书中的很多东西都准确地反映了当今的困境。它也充满了伟大的手绘图表，所以即使是鼹鼠也能理解里面发生了什么！

original: The barrel of an AER-9 Laser Rifle put on a makeshift rig with a crank mechanism. Activate it to crank. Modern power in revolutionary style.
translation: AER-9激光步枪的枪管安装在带有曲柄机构的临时装备上。启动它来启动。革命风格的现代权力。

original: The boxing style of New Reno. More focused on dirty fighting than traditional boxing, you gain the ability to hit harder if you keep hitting. While normally still done with restraint, fighters have been known to use these tactics lethally.
translation: 新雷诺的拳击风格。与传统拳击相比，你更专注于肮脏的战斗，如果你继续击球，你就能获得更猛烈的击球能力。虽然通常情况下仍保持克制，但众所周知，战士们会致命地使用这些战术。

original: The bulgy eye of a gecko, cooked into something vaguely edible. Still disgusting.
translation: 壁虎的凸出的眼睛，被烹调成可以吃的东西。还是很恶心。

original: The cannon from an alien guardian drone. It fires explosive balls of plasma.
translation: 外星守护者无人机的大炮。它发射等离子爆炸球。

original: The fruit of a prickly pear cactus. Incredibly delicious, and super healthy!
translation: 仙人掌的果实。美味无比，超级健康！

original: The fruit of a round barrel cactus. Incredibly delicious, but not healthy when raw.
translation: 圆桶仙人掌的果实。非常美味，但生的时候不健康。

original:
The fury of a dragon is not something to be trifled with. Keep attacking. Annihalate them.

+1 Accuracy, +2 bash Damage.
Enables "Dragon Vortex Block" and "Dragon Wing Dodge"
Lasts 1 turn.
translation:
龙的狂怒是不可玩弄的。继续进攻。安尼亚尔杀了他们。

+1精准度，+2重击伤害。
启用“龙漩涡挡”和“龙翼道奇”

original: The hat of pure evil. Do not trust it's wearer.
translation: 纯粹邪恶的帽子。不要相信它的佩戴者。

original: The helmet of the legate, Caesar's most powerful warrior. It has a face design, and is incredibly beautiful.
translation: 凯撒最强大的战士，公使的头盔。它有一个面部设计，非常漂亮。

original: The horrible abomination that is a combo of a sword and a .44 revolver. Used by weaboos and perverted facists, primarily. Its too bulky to really fit in a holster or sheathe, too.
translation: 一把剑和一把0.44口径的左轮手枪的组合是可怕的可憎之物。主要由懦夫和变态的面部专家使用。它太笨重了，不适合真正放在皮套或护套，太。

original: The horrid spawn of a radscorpion.  Even as a newborn, this foul creature knows only how to kill.
translation: 可怕的蝎子卵。即使刚出生的时候，这种肮脏的生物也只会杀人。

original: The largest variety of Mirelurk. Due to this, they are also the rarest. Their meat is prized by many, and their eggs similarly so. Their power is unmatched.
translation: 最大的品种。因此，它们也是最稀有的。他们的肉被许多人珍视，他们的蛋也是如此。他们的力量无与伦比。

original: The master has blessed you with the next step in human evolution. The world is good as yours.
translation: 师父祝福你人类进化的下一步。世界和你的一样好。

original: The master's voice beckons, and with glee, you inject yourself.
translation: 师父的声音召唤着你，你高兴地把自己注射进去。

original: The master's words help you understand things better.
translation: 大师的话能帮助你更好地理解事物。

original: The metal box your 80% gun came in! You could make a decently sized box mag for one of your big guns.
translation: 你80%的枪进了金属盒！你可以为你的大炮做一个大小合适的盒子。

original: The perfect handmade kit for someone who wants to kill from a distance.
translation: 完美的手工工具，为想远距离杀人的人准备。

original: The pip-boy 2000; an old handheld model of the famous Pip-Boy line of personal computers. While not on your risk like the 3000 model, its still got one hell of a battery life.
translation: 皮普男孩2000；著名的皮普男孩系列个人电脑的旧手持式模型。虽然不像3000型号那样冒险，但它的电池寿命仍然很长。

original: The pip-boy 3000; a bulky wrist-mounted computer. Popularized by Vault-Tecs vaults, these things serve a wide variety of purposes.
translation: 皮普男孩3000；安装在手腕上的笨重的计算机。这些东西由Vault Tecs Vault推广，用途广泛。

original: The plentiful flower that forms the base for the powder of healing.
translation: 形成治疗粉末的基部的丰富的花。

original: The rare root that gives healing properties to the powder of healing
translation: 一种稀有的根，能使愈合的粉末具有愈合的特性

original: The raw eye of a gecko. Absolutely disgusting to some, but edible if cooked right.
translation: 壁虎粗糙的眼睛。对某些人来说绝对恶心，但如果烹调得当可以食用。

original: The sturdy Protectron model of robot was created before the great cataclysm, and served as a security automaton in both the private and business sectors. Multipurpose and modular. This one is aggressively demanding a subway token.
translation: 机器人坚固的Protectron模型是在大灾难之前创建的，在私营部门和商业部门都用作安全自动机。多用途和模块化。这个人强烈要求地铁代币。

original: The sturdy Protectron model of robot was created before the great cataclysm, and served as a security automaton in both the private and business sectors. Multipurpose and modular. You can customize these things heavily.
translation: 机器人坚固的Protectron模型是在大灾难之前创建的，在私营部门和商业部门都用作安全自动机。多用途和模块化。你可以大量定制这些东西。

original: The sturdy Protectron model of robot was created before the great cataclysm, and served as a security automaton in both the private and business sectors. Multipurpose and modular. You can customize these things heavily. This one was programmed as a Wattz crier, its lasers replaced.
translation: 机器人坚固的Protectron模型是在大灾难之前创建的，在私营部门和商业部门都用作安全自动机。多用途和模块化。你可以大量定制这些东西。这一个被编程为Wattz crier，它的激光器被取代。

original: The sturdy Protectron model of robot was created before the great cataclysm, and served as a security automaton in both the private and business sectors. The construction model has a nailgun.
translation: 机器人坚固的Protectron模型是在大灾难之前创建的，在私营部门和商业部门都用作安全自动机。建筑模型有一把射钉枪。

original: The sturdy Protectron model of robot was created before the great cataclysm, and served as a security automaton in both the private and business sectors. The construction model has a water cannon and axe.
translation: 机器人坚固的Protectron模型是在大灾难之前创建的，在私营部门和商业部门都用作安全自动机。这个建筑模型有一个水炮和斧头。

original: The sturdy Protectron model of robot was created before the great cataclysm, and served as a security automaton in both the private and business sectors. This one has a chef hat, and only speaks Japanese.
translation: 机器人坚固的Protectron模型是在大灾难之前创建的，在私营部门和商业部门都用作安全自动机。这个有厨师帽，只会说日语。

original: The sturdy Protectron model of robot was created before the great cataclysm, and served as a security automaton in both the private and business sectors. This one speaks about ... ewwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwww
translation: 机器人坚固的Protectron模型是在大灾难之前创建的，在私营部门和商业部门都用作安全自动机。这个说的是。。。WWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWW

original: The ultimate refinement of the sniper's art. Although, somewhat finicky and prone to jamming if not kept scrupulously clean, the big weapon's accuracy more than makes up for its extra maintenance requirements.
translation: 狙击手艺术的极致精致。虽然，有些挑剔，容易堵塞，如果不保持严格清洁，大武器的准确性远远超过弥补其额外的维修要求。

original: The unique feature of this 'laser assault rifle' is the addition of a 'drum,' which gives this weapon its unique look, high rate of fire, and unusual name.
translation: 这种“激光突击步枪”的独特之处是增加了一个“鼓”，使这种武器具有独特的外观、高射速和不寻常的名称。

original: These smoked and dried chunks of beast-flesh remain chewy-licous and even somewhat nutritious for years, and years... Made with choice boot-scrapings!
translation: 这些熏过的和干过的大块兽肉，多年来都保持着嚼劲和多汁，甚至有些营养。。。用精选靴片制成！

original: They existed long before we did. And by the looks of it, they could outlast us, too.
translation: 他们早在我们之前就存在了。从表面上看，他们也能比我们活得久。

original: Thick gecko-skin body armor. Light and durable, with many pockets for storage.
translation: 厚壁虎皮防弹衣。轻便耐用，配有多个储物袋。

original: Thick gecko-skin body armor. Light and durable, with many pockets for storage. You could swim in acid in this, if you only had facial protection.
translation: 厚壁虎皮防弹衣。轻便耐用，配有多个储物袋。你可以在酸里游泳，只要你有面部保护。

original: This Wattz 1000 laser pistol has been upgraded with a magnetic field targeting system that tightens the laser emission, giving this pistol extra penetrating power.
translation: 这把沃特兹1000激光手枪已升级与磁场定位系统，收紧激光发射，使这把手枪额外的穿透力。

original: This book doesn't feel right... It seems to be a holy book, but you can't pronounce most of the words... Its surprisingly heavy.
translation: 这本书感觉不对。。。这本书看起来很神圣，但是你大部分的单词都不会发音。。。它出奇的重。

original: This eyebot looks like it'll work. Activate it for a patriotic radio.
translation: 这个眼点看起来可以用。为爱国电台激活它。

original: This eyebot looks like it'll work. Turn it on for a dose of GNR, featuring Three Dog!
translation: 这个眼点看起来可以用。把它打开一剂GNR，有三只狗！

original: This eyebot looks like it'll work. Turn it on to tune into Radio Freedom.
translation: 这个眼点看起来可以用。打开它，收听自由电台。

original: This eyebot looks like it'll work. Turn it on to tune into Radio New Vegas.
translation: 这个眼点看起来可以用。打开它收听新维加斯电台。

original: This fine lever action rifle is chambered in the powerful .357 magnum cartridge and features a sleek barrel with a tube fed magazine. Popular among wild west re-enactors.
translation: 这把精致的杠杆式步枪是在强大的.357万能子弹室，并具有一个光滑的管喂杂志桶。在西部狂野的重演者中流行。

original: This heavily-regulated bundle of joy contains the necessary pieces to make a makeshift gatling gun.
translation: 这束受到严格管制的欢乐包含了制造一把临时关灯所必需的零件。

original: This horseshoe crab is heavily mutated. Its a bit larger than normal.
translation: 这种马蹄蟹变异很大。比平常大一点。

original: This huge steel knife is basically a shortsword at this point. Its clearly hand-forged with love.
translation: 在这一点上，这把巨大的钢刀基本上是一把短剑。它的手显然是用爱锻造的。

original: This is a Jimmy Hats brand condom, a very reliable brand.  This one contains phosophorous red dye #5 and has a yummy cinnamon bun flavor... or so you heard.
translation: 这是一个吉米帽子品牌的避孕套，一个非常可靠的品牌。这一个含有磷光红色染料#5，有一个美味的肉桂面包味道。。。或者你听说了。

original: This is a Jimmy Hats brand condom, a very reliable brand. This one contains phosphorous green dye #2 and is slathered in spermicidal lubricant for added protection.
translation: 这是一个吉米帽子品牌的避孕套，一个非常可靠的品牌。这种含有磷绿染料#2，涂上杀精润滑剂以增加保护。

original: This is a Jimmy Hats brand condom, a very reliable brand. This one is ribbed for her pleasure.
translation: 这是一个吉米帽子品牌的避孕套，一个非常可靠的品牌。这一个是为了取悦她。

original: This is a chunk of freshly cooked gecko meat.  It's filling and nutritious, but unseasoned and a bit bland.
translation: 这是一大块刚煮好的壁虎肉。它很饱，很有营养，但没煮过，有点淡。

original: This is a lightweight sword imported from china, used by high ranking officers as a last resort. How it got to the states is unknown, but somebody customized this one so the blade would be electrified. They also customized the handle so you wouldn't get shocked using it.
translation: 这是一把从中国进口的轻型剑，高级军官不得已而为之。它是如何到达美国的还不得而知，但是有人定制了这个，这样刀片就可以通电了。他们还定制了手柄，这样你使用时不会感到震惊。

original: This is a lightweight sword imported from china, used by high ranking officers as a last resort. How it got to the states is unknown.
translation: 这是一把从中国进口的轻型剑，高级军官不得已而为之。它是如何到达美国的还不得而知。

original: This is a pseudo item for monster attacks. If you see this, it's a bug.
translation: 这是怪物攻击的伪道具。如果你看到这个，那就是个虫子。

original: This is a sharp knife, provided to vault dwellers for daily use. It's decent for combat, albeit only against vermin, as well as cutting things.
translation: 这是一把锋利的刀，供金库居民日常使用。这是体面的战斗，虽然只针对害虫，以及削减东西。

original: This is an inactive Wattz protectron. Use this item to reprogram and activate the protectron. If it works, youll have a friend for life.
translation: 这是一个不活动的瓦茨保护管。使用此项重新编程并激活protectron。如果成功了，你会有一个终生的朋友。

original: This is an inactive construction protectron. Use this item to reprogram and activate the protectron. If it works, youll have a friend for life.
translation: 这是一个非活动的建筑防护罩。使用此项重新编程并激活protectron。如果成功了，你会有一个终生的朋友。

original: This is an inactive fire protectron. Use this item to reprogram and activate the protectron. If it works, youll have a friend for life.
translation: 这是一个无效的消防装置。使用此项重新编程并激活protectron。如果成功了，你会有一个终生的朋友。

original: This is an inactive protectron. Use this item to reprogram and activate the protectron. If it works, youll have a friend for life.
translation: 这是一个不活跃的protectron。使用此项重新编程并激活protectron。如果成功了，你会有一个终生的朋友。

original: This isn't just a game, it's a way of life - and it sure can be addicting. This is a standard deck of Tragic the Garnering cards.
translation: 这不仅仅是一个游戏，它是一种生活方式-它肯定可以上瘾。这是一副标准的收集牌。

original: This stuff will last for 200 years. Maybe then a radio DJ will make fun of its age. Go cook it.
translation: 这种东西可以保存200年。也许那时一个电台DJ会拿自己的年龄开玩笑。去煮吧。

original: This submachine gun filled National Guard arsenals after the Army replaced it with newer weapons. However, the 'Grease Gun' was simple and cheap to manufacture so there are still quite a few still in use.
translation: 这把冲锋枪装满了国民警卫队的武器库，后来军队用更新的武器取代了它。然而，“黄油枪”制造简单，成本低廉，因此仍有相当一部分仍在使用中。

original: This, uh, cat fancier's magazine has no redeeming value. You'll learn nothing of use to you in the wastes when you read about...cats.
translation: 这个，呃，猫咪爱好者的杂志没有赎回价值。当你读到关于…猫的东西时，你在荒地里什么也学不到。
结实的壁虎皮靴子。非常耐用。

original: Tough, golden gecko-skin boots.  Very durable, and immune to acid in entirety, you can wade through anything in these.
translation: 坚韧的金色壁虎皮靴子。非常耐用，对酸完全免疫，你可以涉水通过这些任何东西。
生马鞍索尔兹伯里牛排

original: Very strong variety of beer originally imported from a far away land. Tastes a bit like weewee.
translation: 原产于远方的一种啤酒，品种繁多。尝起来有点像小便。

original: Weak shotgun ammunition.  Designed for hunting birds and other small game, its applications in combat are very limited. I guess its good for practice?
translation: 散弹枪弹药太弱了。设计用于猎鸟等小型游戏，其在战斗中的应用非常有限。我想这对练习有好处吧？

original: Well, THIS would have been good to have at the beginning of the goddamn game. Wait, wrong game. Still, theres some funny stuff in here. And a lot of cut content.
translation: 好吧，在这该死的比赛开始的时候这样会很好。等等，玩错游戏了。不过，这里还是有一些有趣的东西。还有很多剪辑内容。

original: When evil walks the streets of Boston, one man lurks in the shadows. Shielding the innocent. Judging the guilty. That guardian is... the Silver Shroud! Published by Hubris Comics.
translation: 当邪恶在波士顿的街道上行走时，一个人潜伏在阴影中。保护无辜。判有罪。那个监护人。。。银色裹尸布！由傲慢漫画出版。

original: When the cataclysm struck, you entered a vault. Unfortunately... There was a zombie in the vault... You managed to escape with the essentials for survival.
translation: 当灾难发生时，你进入了一个地下室。不幸的是。。。地下室里有个僵尸。。。你带着生存的必需品逃走了。

original: When the cataclysm struck, you were working hard in the Vault you were assigned to. Alas, a zombie in the bottom floors spiraled out of control and you escaped with your toolbox.
translation: 大灾变发生时，你正在分配给你的保险库里努力工作。唉，底层的僵尸失控了，你带着工具箱逃走了。

original: When the cataclysm struck, you were working hard in the Vault you were assigned to. Alas, a zombie in the bottom floors spiraled out of control. Your augments helped you escape by the skin of your teeth.
translation: 大灾变发生时，你正在分配给你的保险库里努力工作。唉，底层的僵尸失控了。你的隆胸帮助你逃脱了你的牙齿皮肤。

original: When the cataclysm struck, you were working hard in the Vault you were assigned to. Alas, a zombie in the lab caused you to have to evacuate.
translation: 大灾变发生时，你正在分配给你的保险库里努力工作。唉，实验室里的僵尸让你不得不撤离。
温彻斯特P94等离子连铸机

original:
You are make yourself harder to hit by bobbing and weaving as you move.

+1.0 Dodge skill.
Lasts for 1 turns.  Stacks 2 times.
translation:
当你移动的时候，你会因为摆动和编织而更难被击中。

+1.0闪避技能。
持续1圈。堆叠2次。

original: You are with the master now.

You didn't want to move into a vault with your stupid prepper family. Now a zombie rendered their efforts moot, and youd laugh. If you weren't currently in danger of a zombie attack, that is. Make your mark. Tunnel Snakes Rule!
translation: 你不想和你愚蠢的预科生一家搬进保险库。现在一个僵尸使他们的努力毫无意义，你会笑。如果你现在没有僵尸攻击的危险，那就是。做你的标记。隧道蛇统治！

original: You feel your body changing, very painfully... But you hear a voice guiding you... Master?
translation: 你觉得你的身体在变，非常痛苦。。。但是你听到一个声音在引导你。。。主人？

original: You fought in anchorage for the U.S. Youre used to the cold, used to ruthless attacks. You thought you'd seen it all. Now you know better, as the dead walk the earth.
translation: 你在安克雷奇为美国而战。你习惯了寒冷，习惯了无情的攻击。你以为你都看过了。现在你更清楚了，就像死人在地上行走一样。

original: You have a very strong genetic base.  If you mutate, the odds that the mutation will be beneficial are greatly increased.
translation: 你有很强的遗传基础。如果你变异了，变异有益的几率会大大增加。

original: You have wandered the wastes and learned one of the many martial arts taught across the wastes.
translation: 你在荒野中游荡，学会了在荒野中传授的众多武术之一。

original: You lower your chin and raise your fists to eye level.
translation: 你把下巴放低，把拳头举到眼睛的高度。

original: You raise your spear and prepare for a great hunt.
translation: 你举起你的长矛，准备一场伟大的狩猎。

original: You relax and patiently await conflict like the great dragon.
translation: 你像巨龙一样放松，耐心地等待冲突。

original: You spent your life in the Great Khans gang: guns, Jet, and biking. Now the end is here, and you feel like keeping your life choices up.
translation: 你在大汗帮度过了一生：枪，喷气机，骑自行车。现在结束了，你想继续你的人生选择。

original: You were a bionic-enhanced guard in a vault before the cataclysm. The job was slow, as you were on 'reserve' for emergencies. Alas, an emergency came. A zombie arose in the lower levels, and the whole bunker had to be abandoned. You escaped with your gear.
translation: 你在大灾变前是一个地下室里的仿生强化守卫。工作很慢，因为你在为紧急情况做准备。唉，紧急情况来了。下层出现了一个僵尸，整个掩体不得不被遗弃。你带着装备逃跑了。

original: You were a combat medic during the Anchorage campaign. While your friends fought and died against the reds, you kept most of them alive. You hoped your days of saving lives were behind you, but now you might have to save your own.
translation: 你在安克雷奇战役中是一名战斗医疗兵。当你的朋友们在与红军的战斗中牺牲的时候，你却让他们中的大多数活着。你希望你救人的日子已经过去了，但现在你可能不得不拯救自己的生命。

original: You were a guard in a vault before the cataclysm. The job was slow, and mostly involved keeping the children from being mean to each other. Alas, a zombie arose in the lower levels, and the whole bunker had to be abandoned. You escaped with your gear.
translation: 大灾变前你是地下室的守卫。这项工作进展缓慢，主要是防止孩子们互相刻薄。唉，一个僵尸出现在下层，整个地堡不得不被遗弃。你带着装备逃跑了。

original: You were raised in a vault by some preppers. On your 10th birthday, the party was interrupted by zombies. You were the only one to escape, with your presents: a BB gun and a bat.
translation: 你是在地下室被一些预科生养大的。在你10岁生日那天，聚会被僵尸打断了。你是唯一逃脱的人，带着你的礼物：一把BB枪和一根球棒。

original: You will periodically suffer from delusions, ranging from minor effects to full visual hallucinations.  Some of these effects may be controlled through the use of Thorazine.
translation: 你会周期性地遭受错觉，从轻微的影响到完全的视觉幻觉。其中一些作用可以通过使用胸腺嘧啶来控制。

original: You're a decorated war hero of the Anchorage campaign. You saw things some men couldnt even dream of. You thought the army prepared you for anything. Apparently not.
translation: 你是安克雷奇战役的荣誉战争英雄。你看到了一些男人做梦都想不到的事情。你以为军队为你准备了一切。显然不是。

original: You're hideously deformed.  Some people will have a strong negative reaction to your appearance.
translation: 你畸形得可怕。有些人会对你的外表产生强烈的负面反应。

original: You're not much to look at.  People who care about such things will react poorly to you.
translation: 你没什么好看的。关心这些事情的人对你的反应会很差。

original: You're slightly deformed.  Some people will react badly to your appearance.
translation: 你有点畸形。有些人会对你的外表反应不好。

original: You've always felt that there is more to the world than we can see.  Whether driven by religious beliefs or philosophical interest, you find great inspiration in studying holy texts and experiencing mystical things.
translation: 你总是觉得这个世界比我们能看到的还要多。无论是出于宗教信仰还是哲学兴趣，你都能在研究神圣经文和体验神秘事物中找到巨大的灵感。

original: Your DNA has been damaged in a way that causes you to continually develop more mutations.
translation: 你的DNA已经被破坏，导致你不断发展出更多的突变。

original: Your ants were your best friends for your life. Now theyre your only friends. At least nobody will bully you now... Also, your colony provided you a weird egg before the end times.
translation: 你的蚂蚁是你一生中最好的朋友。现在他们是你唯一的朋友。至少现在没人欺负你了。。。而且，你的殖民地在结束时间之前给了你一个奇怪的蛋。

original: Your body alters itself rapidly, and without your intervention or conscious control.
translation: 你的身体在没有你的干预和有意识的控制的情况下迅速地自我改变。

original: Your hands have become massive fists. Manual dexterity has become harder, and handguns just dont fit your hands as well. But you can punch good.
translation: 你的手变成了巨大的拳头。手的灵巧变得越来越难，手枪也不适合你的手。但你可以打得很好。

original: Your skin is tough from your evolution. You can take a lot more punishment, but can't move as good.
translation: 你的皮肤因进化而变得坚韧。你可以接受更多的惩罚，但不能移动得那么好。

original: Your visage is disgusting and liable to induce vomiting.  People will not want to interact with you unless they have a very good reason to.
translation: 你的面容很恶心，容易引起呕吐。人们不会想和你互动，除非他们有很好的理由。

original: Zen and the Art of Piloting
a complete kit to create a submachine gun from scratch. Heavily regulated throughout the country.
translation: 从零开始制造冲锋枪的完整工具。在全国范围内受到严格监管。

original: a freshly cooked mirelurk claw.  Very nutritious, and the mutagen was cooked out. Boiled with lemon, it lasts a decent amount of time too.
translation: 刚煮好的米卢克爪。很有营养，而且诱变剂是煮出来的。用柠檬煮，也能维持相当长的时间。

original: a freshly cooked mirelurk claw.  Very nutritious, and the mutagen was cooked out. It wont last as long though
translation: 刚煮好的米卢克爪。很有营养，而且诱变剂是煮出来的。但不会持续那么久

original: a homemade firework cannon. Has room for 3 rockets, but one pull of the trigger fires them all. EXTREMELY dangerous.
translation: 自制的烟火炮。有3枚火箭的空间，但一扣扳机就把它们全部引爆。非常危险。

original: a homemade firework cannon. Not as good as a muilitary grade launcher, but you can make fireworks by hand
translation: 自制的烟火炮。不如军事级的发射器好，但你可以手工制作烟花

original: a large omelette made from easily foraged goods. A complete breakfast in and of itself.
translation: 一种大的煎蛋卷，由容易觅食的食物制成。一顿丰盛的早餐。

original: a large omelette made from easily foraged goods. A complete breakfast in and of itself. Now with added heat and cheese. Not really much of a foraged meal now, but its amazing.
translation: 一种大的煎蛋卷，由容易觅食的食物制成。一顿丰盛的早餐。现在加上热和奶酪。现在不算是一顿丰盛的饭了，但它太棒了。

original: a large omelette made from easily foraged goods. A complete breakfast in and of itself. Now with added heat.
translation: 一种大的煎蛋卷，由容易觅食的食物制成。一顿丰盛的早餐。现在有了更多的热量。

original: a large omelette made from easily foraged goods. A complete breakfast in and of itself. Now with cheese.
translation: 一种大的煎蛋卷，由容易觅食的食物制成。一顿丰盛的早餐。现在是奶酪。

original: a large omelette made from easily foraged goods. This one lacks fruit. It's less tasty, but its easier to make during fruitless seasons
translation: 一种大的煎蛋卷，由容易觅食的食物制成。这个缺水果。它不太好吃，但在无果季节更容易制作

original: a large omelette made from easily foraged goods. This one lacks meat and milk. If it werent for the egg, it would be a vegan meal. Its more bland though.
translation: 一种大的煎蛋卷，由容易觅食的食物制成。这个缺肉缺奶。如果不是为了鸡蛋，那就是一顿素食。不过，它更平淡。

original: a large omelette made from easily foraged goods. This one lacks meat and milk. If it werent for the egg, it would be a vegan meal. The fruit was taken out too. It's much more bland now. At least its easier to make.
translation: 一种大的煎蛋卷，由容易觅食的食物制成。这个缺肉缺奶。如果不是为了鸡蛋，那就是一顿素食。水果也被拿了出来。现在更平淡了。至少它更容易制作。

original: a large omelette made from easily foraged goods. This one lacks meat, if youre into that kind of thing.
translation: 一种大的煎蛋卷，由容易觅食的食物制成。如果你喜欢这种东西的话，这个缺肉。

original: a large omelette made from easily foraged goods. This one uses water in the place of milk. The eggs are a bit bland due to such, but what can 'ya do?
translation: 一种大的煎蛋卷，由容易觅食的食物制成。这个用水代替牛奶。因为这样，鸡蛋有点淡，但是你能做什么呢？

original: a mysterious brown egg. activate to hatch
translation: 一个神秘的棕色蛋。激活以填充

original: a mysterious green egg. activate to hatch
translation: 神秘的绿蛋。激活以填充

original: a mysterious red egg. activate to hatch
translation: 神秘的红蛋。激活以填充

original: a pile of rare, alien materials.
a small doll with a big red nose. For some reason, you don't trust this seemingly-innocent child's toy.
translation: 一个红鼻子的小洋娃娃。不知为什么，你不相信这个看似无辜的孩子的玩具。

original: a tiny .22 pistol, invented by the nazis. Less than 10 originals exist. Not that that matters now, not only is rarity irrelevant, but these things are highly unreliable.
translation: 一把小小的.22手枪，是纳粹发明的。只有不到10份原件。现在这并不重要，不仅稀有性无关紧要，而且这些东西非常不可靠。
enclave x-01电动护甲头盔（开启）
enclave x-01电动装甲头盔（开启）
安装罗克韦尔大火箭筒

original: pair of golden gecko-skin arm guards
pairs of golden gecko-skin arm guards

translation: 一品脱大小的剃刀面具

original: two 140mm cannons from a tank, with twin 4-round autoloaders.  Obviously it needs to be mounted on a vehicle to fire.
translation: 两门140毫米炮从一个坦克，双4轮自动装弹机。显然它需要装在车上才能开火。
